GSP33yaatsi_u:589: śarīraṃ cetanāvat icchānuvidhāyikriyatvādindriyādimattvādvā yannaiva tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti vyatirekānumānaṃ ca dehasya caitanye 'tra vākye garbhitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:591: kramukaphalasaṃmiśricūrṇakopaliptatāmbūlapatrasya dantasaṅghaṭṭanaiḥ pūrvāvayavavināśe tadavayavānāṃ saṃśleṣaviśeṣato niṣpanne piṇḍitāvayavini raktaṃ rūpamavayaveṣvavidyamānaṃ saṃśleṣaviśeṣata eva teṣāmutpannamiti tatra vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:593: dantasaṃmardaiḥ pūrvāvayavino vdyuṇukaparyantasya nāśe paramāṇuṣu svatantreṣu carvaṇodbhūtamukhyāgnisaṃyogalakṣaṇapākavaśādraktarūpasyotpatteḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakameva piṇḍitāvayavini raktaṃ rūpamiti na vyabhicāra iti bhāva ākṣeptuḥ pariharati 'na pramāṇābhāva'diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:595: yathā haridrācūrṇe cūrṇakajalasaṃyogenaiva hi raktaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:596: tathātrāpi saṃbhavāt pākakalpanāyāṃ mānābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:606: rūpatvādinā sājātyavivakṣāyāṃ tu tasyāpi prasaṅga iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:615: citraḥ paṭa iti cābādhitapratītivyavahārataśritraṃ rūpamapyeṣṭavyayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:617: tathā ca na tatra vyabhicāra ityatrāha - 'viśeṣaguṇaśce'ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:618: / jalīyasya karakasyāvayavasaṃśleṣaviśeṣādārambhakasahakārivaicitryācca dravatvarahitasya kaṭhinasparśa upalabhyamāno na kāraṇaguṇapūrvakaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:620: tathā ca karakasparśe kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:623: avayavasaṃyogaviśeṣasya kāṭhinyarūpatve tasyāvayavinyavṛtteḥ kaṭhinaḥ karaka iti pratītivyavahārau na syātām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:624: kathañcittadupapādane 'pi cākṣuṣadravyavṛttisaṃyogasya cākṣuṣatvātkāṭhinyasya cakṣuṣāpyupalaṃbhaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:627: padārthavidbhiḥ kāṇādaiḥ sparśaviśeṣatayaiva ca tadabhyupagatamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:634: tatkriyāyāṃ tadaiva kasyacitkartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca na yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:643: ucyate, tannyāyasya na dehātmavāde daṇḍanivāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:644: vastuto yādṛśasya karmatvasya kartṛtvena virodhaḥ, na tādṛśaṃ jñānakarmatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:656: / saviṣayārthadhātuyoge karmatvaṃ viṣayatārūpamiti hi tārkikāṇāṃ samayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:663: aniṣṭasya jñātasya tu 'tathā yuktaṃ cānīpsita'mityanenaiva kriyāyuktaṃ - jñānena viṣayatayā saṃbaddhaṃ anīpsitaṃ jñeya tvenecchāviṣayabhūtamapi karmeti cārtho 'mukhyakarmatvapakṣe vyavahārasya jñānaphasatve 'pi tadāśrayatvābhāvānna viṣayasya mukhyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:672: aiśvaryamahimakṣayāyāsurāṇāṃ vaidikaścaddhāvilopakaṃ mohakaṃ tantraṃ nirmitaṃ suraguruṇāsurendrānunayavivaśeneti ca prasiddhiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:675: taiḥ saṃhatya niṣpādite dehe pratyekamasadapi caitanyamudbhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:676: kiṇvādibhyo niṣpādite surādravya ivāpūrvā madaśaktiriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:681: parāgvṛttiridamiti śarīraviṣayiṇī ca śemuṣī svaviṣayamahaṅkāragocarādvivecayati yathāyaṃ ghaṭa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:684: na hi devadatto daṇḍinamātmānaṃ daṇḍyayamiti pratyeti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:685: anyacca, niyamitabahirindriyavṛtteravahitamanaso 'hamiti svātmānamavayataḥ karacaraṇodarādyavayavā na bhāsante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:688: / na hyāsti saṃbhavaḥ - avayavī sthavīyān pracakāsti ; avayavāstu na kecana prathanta iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:692: na cāvayavini bahirandriyagrāhya evāyaṃ niyama ityutprekṣyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:696: tatrāpi tādṛśānekāvayavapratibhāso 'styeva spṛśyamāna iva ghaṭādāviti na tena vyabhicāraḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:697: yattu sthūlo 'haṃ kṛśo 'hamiti śarīre 'haṃpratyayo dṛśyata iti ; tadapi paryālocanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:699: gocayati, na punaścākṣuṣa iva dehapratyayaḥ sthaulyabālyādiyogidehamātram /
GSP33yaatsi_u:700: ata eva mamedaṃ gṛhamitivāt mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedapratibhāso vyavahāraśca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:701: na hyasau sākṣātpratītabhedanimittaḥ pratāyamānaḥ śilāputrakaśīravyapadeśavadaupacāriko yukta āśriyituṃ mamātmetivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:704: ato dehavyatirekiṇaḥ cetanasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāccatsaṃbandhini lākṣaṇiko dehe 'haṃśabdaprayogaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:705: bāhyaviṣayeṣu parasparaviruddharūpaparimāṇasaṅkhayāsanniveśagrahaṇena vyatirekasya sphaṭatvāt ātmani tādṛśarūpāntarāgrahaṇena dehābhedapratibhāsabhramo 'vivekinām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:711: praṇihitamanasastu jñātṛtayā siddhyantamahamākāramarthamanavayavamidamiti parisphurataḥ sthūlādavayavinaḥ śarīrāt pṛthagaparokṣayantyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:712: bhavanti ca - jānāmīti pratyayaḥ śarīraviṣayo na bhavati ;
GSP33yaatsi_u:713: arthāntaraviṣayo vāyam ; aprakāśamānatadavayavapratibhāsatvāt ; ya evaṃprakāraḥ sa tathā, yathāyamiti pratibhāsaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:714: yaccharīraviṣayaṃ, na tat tathā ; yathobhayasaṃ mataṃ śarīrajñānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:723: idantvena grahaṇameva hastagehāderiva dehasyātmabhedagrahalakṣaṇaṃ tasyātmatve bādhakamityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:737: ayaṃbhāvaḥ - ahamiti svasmai bhāsamānaḥ pratyagarthaḥ svātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:738: svasmā idantvenaṃ bhāsamānaśca parāgarthaḥ para iti svaparavibhāgo hi ahamidaṃbuddhiśabdābhyāmeva nirūpyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:741: pratyaktvenāhamiti bhāsamānasyaiva svātmanoḥ daṇḍitvenedamiti bhānaṃ syāddaṇḍyayamitītyarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:746: / tathā ca pratyagvṛttirahaṅkāraḥ, parāgvṛttiridaṅkāra iti vyavasthāyāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:762: trasareṇorniravayavatvānna tadgrūhaṇe niruktaniyamasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:764: pratyakṣayogyā avayavā yasya, tasyāvayavinaḥ avayavabhānavyāpyabhānavattvaniyamānna tryaṇukapratyakṣe vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:769: avayavipratyakṣatvavyāpakatvasyāvayavabhāne svīkāre bādhakopalambho hi bāhyatatpratyakṣamātraviṣayakatayā niyamasaṅkoce mānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:771: nanu manasā kevalamavayavi gṛhyate vināvayavamityata eva niyamaḥ saṅkocanīya iti cettatrāha 'antakaraṇasye'ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:772: advārīkṛtabahirindriyasya manasaḥ kevale 'vayavaviśeṣṭa vā śarīrādau bāhyārthe
GSP33yaatsi_u:775: ato na manasā śarīrasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭeta kevalena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:776: caitanyavattvena tasyābāhyatvānmanasā grahaṇaṃ bavedvināvayaveneti tu na kalpanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:779: rūpādimadavayavipratyakṣasya tadavayavagocaratvamiti niyame naiva doṣaḥ nīrūpatvādvāyoḥ sparśavattvamātreṇa tasya spārśanopagame 'pīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:781: avayavisannikarṣe tadavayavasannikarṣasyāvarjanīyatvādyogyasannikṛṣṭāvayavabhānasyāvayavibhānaniyatatvenāvayavavipratyakṣasya tadavayavagocaratvamiti niyame 'pi na vāyuspārśane vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:782: tatra tadavayavasyāpi bhānāt, ghaṭaspārśana iva ghaṭāvayavasyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:793: apṛthaksiddhaprakāravācināṃ ca niṣkarṣakabhinnānāṃ śabdānāṃ dharmiṇi mukhyavṛtterupagamāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:796: mamedaṃ śarīramiti bhedavyapadeśasya śilāputrakasya śarīramitivadaupacārikatvamastvityāśaṅkāṃ vyudasyati 'na hyasā'viti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:809: ahaṃ gacchāmītyādāvahaṃśabda ātmavati dehe lākṣaṇika iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:810: dehātmabhramavatāṃ tu śaktibhramamūlastathā prayoga iti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:811: evaṃ tarkabalādahaṃ jānāmīti mānasapratyakṣasya sāvayavadehavyatiriktātmaparatvaṃ vyavasthāpitam
GSP33yaatsi_u:812: evaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano bhāne sati kathaṃ dehābhedabhrama udetītyatrāha
GSP33yaatsi_u:823: rūpādyapyevamātmani tadasaṃbhavagrahamantarā na bhedakam /saṅkhyādistu sādhāramatvānna bhedaka iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:824: bādhakasya bhedakakāragrahasyābhāvamupapādya aikyabhrame sādhakaṃ sādṛśyajñānaṃ copapādayati itaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:826: abhyūha ti iti upasargādasyatyūhyorveti vācya siti vārtikeṇa vaikalpikaṃ parasmaipadam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:833: ātmā hi manogocaraḥ, sa cet sāvayavaḥ, tathā gṛhyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:838: avahitamanaso niruktaparāmarśavataśca manasā dehavailakṣaṇyenātmanaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:840: evamahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣasya dehātiriktātmaviṣayatvaṃ tarkabalena vyavasthāpitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:841: idameva prayogārūḍhaṃ pradarśayati bhavanti ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:843: prathamaprayoge śarīraviṣayakatvābhāvaḥ, anantaraprayoge śarīrātiriktaviṣayakatvaṃ cāhaṃ jānāmītyaparokṣasya pradidarśayiṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:858: saṅghātā hi sarve parārthā dṛṣṭāḥ śayanāsanarathādayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:859: na ca saṅghātāḥ saṃhataśarīrādyarthā dṛśyanta ityātmano 'pi
GSP33yaatsi_u:863: yogyānupalambhabādhitaṃ cātmani saṅghātatvam /saṅghātāntarārthatve ca tasyāpi tathā, tato 'nyasyāpi tatheti na vyavatiṣṭheta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:865: na ca saṅghātasya parārthatve parasya saṃhatatvamapi prayojakam ; bhoktṛtayaivātmanaḥ svārthasaṅghātaṃ prati paratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:868: śarīrapakṣakānātmatvasādhakaprayoge tṛtīyaṃ saṅghātatvarūpaṃ hetumupakṣipati kiṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:874: dehe 'smin, ātmabuddhiḥ kathaṃ jāyeteti ślokārthaḥ // atrāyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:878: ātmatvāparārthatvayoḥ parārthatvānātmatvayośca vyāpyavyāpakabhāvaṃ śloke pūrvārdhoktaṃ vivṛṇoti sarvasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:885: saṅghātaparasya saṃhatatvadṛṣṭeḥ śarīraparatvenānumitasyā'tmano 'pi saṅghātatvaṃ syādityāśaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati na ca saṅgātā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:887: ātmā saṅghātarūpaṃ saṃhataparatvādityanumāne pratitarko 'tra vivakṣitaḥ ātmā yadi saṅgātaḥ syāttarhiparārthaḥ syāditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:888: ātmā na saṅghātaḥ aparārthatvāditi pratyanumānaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:890: yadvā anumānabalātprasaktamapi saṅghātatvamātmanaḥ pramāṇāntaraviṣayīkārato nivartsyatītyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:893: yatra pakṣe sādhyābhāvaḥ pramāṇāntareṇa niścitaḥ tatra vahneranuṣṇatvānumāna iva pakṣabhinnatvasyopādhitvasaṃbhavāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:894: prakṛte 'pi śarīrātmavādināṃ tadatiriktātmavādināṃ vā saṃhataparārthatvābhāva evopeyate śarīrasyeti
GSP33yaatsi_u:903: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ vyavasthāyāṃ saṃbhavatyāṃ saṃhataparārthatvena tasya vyāpterāśrayaṇamanavasthāprayojakatvānna yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:905: sa ca saṃhataparārthatvenaiva saṅghātatvasya bhavet, khaṭvādau tathā darśanādityata āha na ca saṅghātasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:906: parasya saṃhatatvamantaraiva saṅghātaprayojyaniyatabhogarūpātiśayabhāktvena taṃ prati śeṣitvalakṣaṇaṃ paratvaṃ -prādhānyaṃ saṃbhavatīti parārthatvaniyamasya saṅgāta upapatteḥ sapakṣadṛṣṭamapi parasya saṃhatatvaṃ nāvinābhāvagrahopayogi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:908: sapakṣe darśanamātreṇa vyāptyanupayogi-sarvagharmoparāgeṇa sādhyasya pakṣe 'numāne 'numānāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgaśvetyāha vyāptyanupayogino 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:918: evamahaṃ jānāmītyāderahaṃpratyayasya pratyakṣarūpasya dehātiriktaviṣayatvaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ tarkeṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:919: tathā cāhaṃpratyaya eva dehabhedapratyayarūpa itīdaṅkāragocare dehe ātmabhedo 'pi pratyakṣasiddha ityavarṇi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:922: sarva eva kāryadravyagataviśeṣaguṇaḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kathamatatpūrvakaḥ śarīre caitanyaguṇaḥ saṃbhavet? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:923: yattu bārhaspatya vacanam - pṛthivyāpastejo vāyuriti tattvāni,
GSP33yaatsi_u:926: sarvadravyeṣu tattatkāryasamadhigabhyaḥ tatpratiyogī śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:933: naca śarīrāvayaveṣu pratyekaṃ caitanyaguṇaḥ prajñāyate pratijñāyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:937: yattu- akāraṇaguṇapūrvakaṃ citrarūpaṃ paṭe iti ; tanna /
GSP33yaatsi_u:939: sā ca nānārūpaiḥ tantubhiḥ kriyata iti kimanupapannamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:940: pratyekamavidyamānamapi taccitrarūpaṃ tantuṣu saṃhateṣu dṛśyata eva citrā ime tantava iti /saṃbhūya ca teṣāṃ paṭārambhakatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:944: sa tu rūpaireva kāraṇagatairnānāvidhairārabhyata iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:950: api ca dṛḍha eva śarīre virodhiguṇāpātamantareṇa kusumavilepanagandha iva nivartamānaḥ caitanyasukhādirna tadguṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:953: pratyakṣayogyāḥ, bāhyendriyagrāhyāśca; na ca tathā jñānādiriti nāso tadguṇaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:966: tadguṇāntare tyatra tadruṇa ityatra ca tacchabdena śarīrasya parāmarśanīyatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:967: śarīre jñānaguṇasyotpatterayogāccharīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyācca na jñānaṃ śarīraviśeṣaguṇa iti kārikārthaḥ //6//
GSP33yaatsi_u:968: śarīre jñānasyāsaṃbhavaṃ tāvadupapādayati sarva eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:971: śarīrāvayaveṣu jñānasyābhāvāt, bhāve vā ekasminneva dehe
GSP33yaatsi_u:978: tatprati- yogī- tattatkāryeṇa nirūpyasvarūpaḥ prayojakatvena śaktayākhyo guṇaḥ sarvasminnapi dravye tattatkāryapratiniyato 'stīti ca śaktyaḥ sarvabhāvānāmacintyajñānagocarāḥ iti purāṇaratnavacanato 'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:992: evamapi prabhātvajātisvīkāre prabhāyāṃ, vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā vāyau vyabhicāravāraṇāya ekavidhapratyakṣagrāhyajātīyaguṇatvāditi vaktavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:993: guṇatvapraveśe ca kāryatve satīti cintyaprayojanamiti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:994: viśeṣaguṇalakṣaṇe ca jñānādibhinnatvaṃ na dātuṃ śakyaṃ jñānāderviśeṣaguṇatve prāmāṇike satīti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:995: saṅghātaviśeṣāvayavivāde tu avayaveṣu caitanyābhāvādeva dehasya caitanyaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cānusandheyamatra /
GSP33yaatsi_u:996: nanu rasaviśeṣo gandhaviśeṣo vā mādako madaśabdavācyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:997: sa ca viśeṣaguṇo na kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka iti kāryadravyaviseṣaguṇasya kāraṇaguṇapūrvakatvaniyamo durvaca ityatrā'ha
GSP33yaatsi_u:999: kiṇvādīnāṃ sammardanādināvdyaṇukaparyantanāśe svatantraiḥ paramāṇubhirdravyāntarāvayavasaṃśleṣajanitamadairārabdhe surādravye kāraṇaguṇapūrvaka eva guṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1005: dehāvayaveṣu caitanye sādhakābhāvamuktvā bādhakamapyāha tadupagama iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1008: teṣāmeva cetanatve tu parasparāniyamyatayā parasparavārtānabhijñatayā ca vyavahāravisaṃvādaḥ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1010: yamadrākṣaṃ taṃ spṛśāmītyādipratisandhānasya tanmūlavyavahārasya ca vilopaḥ prasajyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:1014: vijātīyarūpeṣu tantuṣu saṃhateṣu citrapratītimāha pratyekam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1021: laukikaviṣayatayā dravyacākṣuṣe sāmānādhikaraṇyena mahattvaviśiṣṭodbhūtarūpasya samavāyena hetutvasaṃbhave hetutāvacchedakakoṭau vyāpyavṛttitvaviśeṣaṇe prayojanābhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1022: tathā ca citrapaṭasya na cākṣuṣatvānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1025: tantugatavividharūpaiḥ paṭe citrarūpārambhavadavayavagatairanudbhūtacaitanyairdehe udbhūtacaitanyārambho 'stviti ca na śaṅkyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1030: jñānasyeva sukhāderapi viśeṣaguṇasya na śarīradharmatvasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1032: atha tadguṇāntaravaidharmyā dityetadvivṛṇoti api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1037: bhāvaḥ- agnisaṃyogena rūpaparāvṛttāvapi tadaprasaṅge rūpasya yāvaddravyabhāvitvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1043: svātmamātragrāhyatvaṃ manomātragrāhyatvaṃ ca jñānādeḥ śarīraviśeṣaguṇāntaravaidharmyamiti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1046: atra prayogaḥ-jñānaṃ na śarīraviśeṣaguṇaḥ ayāvaddravyabhāvitvānmanomātragrāhyatvādvā yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā rūpādīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1047: evaṃ jñānasya śarīradharmatvābhāvasādhanena śarīrasyātmatvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1053: evaṃ pratyakṣavirodhāt, anvayamukhena sādhyamupasthāpadbhirudīritasādhanairapahṛtaviṣayatayā indriyāśrayatvādivyatirekihetavo na sādhyamupasthāpayitumīśate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1056: na ca tānīdantayā prathante; yena dehavadaha ṅkāragocarādbahiṣkrriyeran /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1057: nāpi tathodbhūtarūpādiguṇāni sthūlāni; yena tatpratibhāsa ivendriyagocaratve 'haṃpratyayasya rūpāvayavādipratītiḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1058: tavdyāpāraphalaṃ ca jñānaṃ tadgāmi yuktaṃ snānādhyayanādiphalavat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1065: yadi pratyekam, indriyāntaradṛṣṭasyendriyāntareṇa pratisandhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1068: na hi pañcabhirindriyaiḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ vastvanubhūyate 'nusandhīyate vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1070: indriyacaitanye ca tattadindriyāpāye tattadindriyārthasmaraṇamapi na bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1073: anyathā ca praṣṭurmṛtyupapattiṃ śaraṇāgataparityāgasya nṛśaṃsatāṃ cā'locya
GSP33yaatsi_u:1077: tathā sati hi pūrvoktā doṣāḥ parihṛtā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1079: upapadyate cendriyāntareṇa pratisandhānam ; darśanānusandhānādhārasya manasa ekatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1084: bāhyendriyeṣu yathāyathaṃ nijaviṣayasannikarṣabhāgiṣvapi yato na yugapadeva sarve viṣayāḥ pratīyante, ato 'vagacchāmaḥ-asti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1089: tadevaṃ jñānakaraṇatayāvagatasya manasaḥ kathamiva jñāne kartṛtvam ?/
GSP33yaatsi_u:1091: tacca svacchandānurodhena sādhyasiddhyanuguṇopakaraṇasaṃpādanasāmarthyam ; svasamavetameva vā guṇāntaraṃ tantrīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1092: karaṇatvaṃ tu parādhiṣṭhānādhīnavyāpāratārūpapāra tantryaniyataṃ sādhakatamatvamiti kathamivaikatra manasi parasparaviruddha tadubhayadharmasaṃbandhaṃ pratipadyemahi ? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1093: atha tadapi manaḥ karaṇāntareṇa smaraṇādiṣu kartṛbhāvamanubhavati, tathā sati saṃjñāmātre vivādaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1094: ya eva hi cakṣurādibhī rūpādin āntarakaraṇena ca sukhādīṃścetayate, sa evā'tmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1095: tasminneva cet manaḥsaṃjñā niveśyate, kāmaṃ niveśyatām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1103: uktaṃ nāma; tathāpi kathaṃ tattvāntarasiddhiḥ ?/ kalpayitvāpi hi tat
GSP33yaatsi_u:1109: yāvadanubhūtasakalaviṣayasusmūrṣayā sarvataḥ pratyāhṛtacetasaḥ sādhāraṇyena praṇidadhayo 'pi na sarva evārthāḥ smṛtimadhirohanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1111: kramajñānasvābhāvyādvā ātmanaḥ ; tathā sati bahirindriyeṣu ca yathā yathaṃ svaviṣayasaṃprayukteṣu tathaiva yugapajjñānānutpattirupapadyata iti kṛtamindriyāntareṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1122: prayatna eva tvadṛṣṭasyāpīti nātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādīnāmasamavāyikāraṇasāpekṣatayāpi dravyāntaraparikalpanaṃ nyāyyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1126: / kāryadravye tathā darśanāditi cet, iha vā tahri kiṃ na dṛśyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:1127: iṣṭāniṣṭaprāptyavagamānantaraṃ sukhādirjāyata iti ?/ dṛṣṭakāraṇavyabhicāre hi kāraṇāntarānumānāvasaraḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1129: ataḥ prasiddhakāraṇabhāveṣveva yatra kāryasamavāyaḥ tat samavāyikāraṇam, yattu tatpratyāsannaṃ tadasamavāyi, yadanyat tannimittimiti vyavasthāśrayaṇamucitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1135: sa tarhi sparśavaddravyasamaveto bhautika eva copalabdha iti prasiddhadehādisaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna navama dravyasiddhiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1154: tanna tatprakṛtitvapratipādanaparam, apitu tadadhīnavṛttitāmātrapradarśanārtham āpomayaḥ prāṇaḥ ityādivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1156: darśitaṃ hi tatraivāṣṭame manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate mano 'sya daivaṃ cakṣuriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1157: tathā parasyāśca devatāyāḥ so 'nyaṃ kāmaṃ manasā dhyāyīteti mahopaniṣadi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1161: paramārthatastu na bhautikam, nāpi navamaṃ dravyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1163: ata eva hi buddhimān manasvīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1164: manaso 'vasthābhaidāśca drāgevāparokṣyante kṣubhitaṃ me manaḥ, prasannaṃ me mana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1165: evaṃ ca manasaḥ karaṇatayā vyapadeśo buddhyahaṅkārayoriva vṛttibhedapradarśanaparaḥ pūrveṣāmiti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1166: ucyate-yadi buddhireva manaḥ ; yadi vā dravyāntaram; ubhayadhāpi tasya na
GSP33yaatsi_u:1169: astu tarhi prāṇa evā'tmā, tathā sati tadanvayini śarīre
GSP33yaatsi_u:1173: itarathā paramamahato mahataśca sparśavirahiṇaḥ parispandānupapatterutkrāntigatyāgatiśrutayo bhāktāḥ syuḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1177: tadvṛttyā hi suptasyāpi saptadhātubhāvenāśitapītadravyapariṇāmaḥ ; śvāsapraśvāsau ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1179: sa ca kaṇṭhamukhanāsābhyantare bahiśca recitaḥ tvacā spṛśyamāno ghaṭādiriva sphuṭamanātmatayā cakāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1180: atraiva sādhye sādhanāntarāṇi cāha utpattimattvā dityādikārikādvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1189: etadvādhitatvamāha dehe ātmatvaṃ sādhayatāṃ kevalavyatikeriṇām evam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1194: dehātmatvapakṣoktāni dūṣaṇāni nātra pakṣe prasajyanta ityāha na ca tānī tyādivākyadvayena
GSP33yaatsi_u:1196: jñānamindriyadharmaḥ, indriyavyāpāraphalatvāt, yavdyāpāraphalaṃ yat tattanniṣṭham, yathā snānādhyayanādivyāpāraphalaṃ śaucākṣararāśigrahaṇādi
GSP33yaatsi_u:1202: indriyātmatve 'numānamuktvā'ptavākyamapi saṃvādarūpaṃ nirdiśati ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1208: pratyekendriyacaitanyapakṣe nānāsvāmika iva grāma ekasminneva dehe nānācetanādhiṣṭānānnityakalahādi prasajyate iti dūṣaṇaṃ hṛdi nādhāya dūṣaṇāntaramāha indriyāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1214: tathā hi - saṅghāto yadi saṃyogo bahutvasaṅkhyā vā, tarhi guṇatvādeva na jñātṛtvasaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1215: yadi saṃyuktānāṃ bahūnāmeva saṅghātatvena vivakṣā, tadāpi na bahūnāmindriyāṇāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1219: saṅghātasya tāvataiva vinaṣṭatvānnirātmakatvena dehasya maraṇaprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1225: atha tatsādhakamanumānaṃ dūṣayati na ca tavyadyāpāre ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1229: atha satyatapaso vacanaṃ karaṇe kartṛtvopacāreṇa pravṛttamanyaparaṃ nendriyacaitanye pramāṇamityāha anyathā ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1230: svāśramapraviṣṭavanamṛgānveṣaṇapravṛttavyādhakṛtapraśrottararūpaṃ satyatapaso vacanam draṣṭuścakṣuṣo nāsti jihvā ityādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1231: etasminnarthe śloko 'yamanugṛhīto 'smadgurucaraṇaiḥ yā paśyati na sā brūte sā na paśyati dṛṣṭirvakti kathaṃ vyādha vāṇī vā vīkṣate katham // iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1234: kathane ca śaraṇāgataparityāganibandhanaṃ mahatpāpaṃ paryālocya evaṃ vaktoktiḥ kṛtā maharṣiṇeti bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1235: atha mana ātmatvapakṣamupakṣipati astu tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1237: mano hi pradhānāṃ sarvendriyaprerakaṃ ca gamyate pramāṇato, vyavahliyate ca tathetyarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1238: indriyātmatvapakṣoktānāṃ smṛtipratisandhānānupapattinānātmaprasaṅgādidoṣāṇāṃ nātra pakṣe prasaṅga ityāha upapadyate ce tyādivākyadvayena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1239: manasa ātmatvaṃ dūṣayati tadapi ne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1240: karaṇatvā diti sarvatra jñāne karaṇatvānmanaso na tatra kartṛtvamāśrayatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1243: tasya ca na jñātṛtvaṃ cakṣurāderiva saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1249: evaṃ bāhyārtheṣu yugapajjñānānāmanutpattiliṅgena sarvendriyasahakāritvenāṇubhūtasya manasaḥ karaṇaviśeṣasyānumānamuktvā āntarasukhādisākṣātkāreṣu karaṇatayāpi manaso 'numānamāha tathā sukhādī ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1250: / nanu karaṇatayānumitasyaiva manaso jñānādau kartṛtvamapyastu lāghavā
GSP33yaatsi_u:1258: yadyapi cetanasyaikatra kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ ca saṃbhavennāmā'kārabhedataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1259: athāpi manasaścaitanye dṛḍhatarapramāṇābhāvāt lokasiddhavyāptyā ca cakṣurādivatparasya cetanasya sukhādyanubhavakaraṇatayaiva siddherna manaso jñātṛtvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1261: tataśca mano vijñānamayasya jīvasyopakaraṇatayaiva siddhyatīti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1263: āntarasukhādyanubhave karaṇaṃ tvāntaramanyatkalpyata iti śaṅkate atha tadapi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1267: saṃjñā tu aicchikīti nārthe vivāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1269: mana iti nātmano vyavahāro laukikānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1272: athātra paramācāryo 'yaṃ vimarśakabhūmikāmāsthitaḥ prasaṅgāt manasastattvavicāraṃ prakramate āhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1278: manasi pramāṇamākṣipati uktaṃ nāme tyādinā /yugapajjñānānutpattiliṅgena dravyāntaramāntaraṃ karaṇaṃ na siddhyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1289: yeṣāmarthasaṃskārāṇāṃ sādhāraṇamudbodhakaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtamanubhūtayāvadarthasmṛtīcchayaikadaiva tadāpi na yāvadarthasmṛtayo yugapat jāyante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1294: nanvevamapi sukhahetvarthānāṃ śubhādṛṣṭabalādyugapatsmaraṇāni syuriti cettatrāha krame ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1295: kramikajñānabhāktvalakṣaṇātmasvabhāvabalādadṛṣṭasahakāravirahācca smṛtiyaugapadyasyeva bāhyārthajñānayaugapadyasyāpi pariharaṇasaṃbhavāt nāṇubhūtaṃ manobāhyendriyasahakāri karaṇāntaramāntaraṃ kalpanīyamiti samuditāśayaḥ manasi pramāṇāntaramupakṣipati syānmatam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1298: ātmetyādi bāhyetyādi ca ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ padadvayaṃ bahuvrīhivṛttaṃ sukhāderviśeṣaṇam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1302: anukūlaviṣayasya pratikūlaviṣayasya ca jñānasyaivātmani niyatapūrvavṛtteḥ sukhe duḥkhe ca kāraṇasya tatrāsamavāyihetutvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1306: kāryatājñāne ca smṛtirūpe udbuddhasaṃskāraḥ, anubhavarūpe ca liṅgajñānādi tathā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1310: / icchāṃ prati iṣṭajātīyatvasyeṣṭasādhanatvasya vā jñānaṃ tathā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1311: dveṣaṃ prati cāniṣṭatvasya tatsādhanatvasya vā jñānaṃ tathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:1312: / ātmaviśeṣaguṇānāṃ kutrāpyasamavāyihetutvaṃ nāstīti pravādastu na śraddheya iti manuditāśayaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1315: kutrāpi jñānādau ātmaviseṣaguṇe mano 'pekṣā nāstīti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1316: sādhanāntaraṃ manasi śaṅkate yattu nitye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1319: dravyāntarasaṃyogasya sukhādau asamavāyihetutvāsaṃbhavānmanaḥsaṃyogasyaiva tathātvena pariśeṣānmanasaḥ siddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1326: pārthivāṇurūpādau dahanasaṃyogasya hetutvamapi tato dehāvayavādau rūpādiparāvṛtterddaṣṭatvāddṛṣṭānusārādeva kalpyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1328: samavāyikāraṇa ātmani pratyāsannatvāttasyaivāsamavāyihetutvaṃ ca yuktaṃ tatreti nādṛṣṭadravyāntarasaṃyogasya tathātvena kalpanāvasara iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1337: sukhādau tu tadviparyayaḥ- kāraṇāntaropalambharūpaṃ dṛṣṭāntato vaiṣamyaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1340: vyāptisvīkāre cārthāntaramityāha evamapī ti/ sa tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1342: dṛṣṭānte saḥ dravyāntarasaṃyogaḥ bhautikaḥ- bhūtārabdhaḥ bhautikapratiyogika eva dṛṣṭa iti prakṛte 'pi bhautikadehādipratiyogikātmānuyogikasaṃyoga evānumānaparyavasānānna kāṇādābhimatanavamadravyarūpābhautikamanaḥsiddhipratyāśetyarthaḥ sparśavaddravyasamaveta iti nidarśanābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1345: evaṃ sukhādāvasamavāyihetutvena dravyāntasaṃyogasya sādhanaṃ na saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1352: mano na pārthivaṃ taijasādi vā rasāvagamanimittendriyatvādrasanāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1360: rasagrāhakendriyatvaṃ jalīyatvaṃ gandhagrāhakendriyatvādi pārthivatvādi ca manasaḥ sādhayediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1366: yadbhūtaguṇamātragrāhakaṃ yadindriyaṃ tadeva bhūtāntaravyatiriktatvena saṃpratipannamiti bhūtāntaraguṇagrāhakatāmātreṇa na tattadbhūtaguṇagrāhakasya manasaḥ tattadbhūtavyatirekasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1371: evamabhautikatvānumānaṃ pradūṣya manaso bhautikatvānumānamupasthāpayati api ca śabdādī ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1373: pañcabhūtopādanakatve gauravājjātisāṅkaryabhītyā ca pakṣāntaramāha ekadvī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1375: asya pārthivatve śrutimapi saṃvādarūpeṇodāharati annamayaṃ hī ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:1381: annarasāpyāyitasyaiva manasaḥ saṅkalpanādivyāpārakṣamatayānnamayatvaṃ śrūyate 'nnarasaparipoṣitatvalakṣaṇam, vāyuviśeṣasya prāṇasyevāmmayatvaṃ jalarasāpyāyitatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1383: yadi bhautikaṃ manaḥ, tarhi muktau nānuvarteta dehādivaditi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1387: muktasya manoyogamuktvā nityamuktasvabhāvasyeśvarasyāpi tatra pramāṇamudāharati tathe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1397: ata eva svāśayaṃ prakaṭīkaroti manoviṣaye paramārthatastu ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1402: buddhereva manastve laukikavyavahāramuktvā laukikapratyakṣamapi pradarśayati manasaḥ iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1403: manaḥ prasannamityādyadhyakṣaṃ pratyakṣabuddhyālambanameva saṃbhavati, na tvatīndriyamanogocaramiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1405: nanu buddherjñānasyaiva manastve 'ntaḥkaraṇatvoktistasya kathaṃ saṅgacchata ityatrāha evaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1409: atra vimarśakena sukhādisākṣātkārakaraṇatvena manaso 'numānaṃ tārkikābhimataṃ na vimṛṣṭam
GSP33yaatsi_u:1413: āhe tyādinā vimarśakenātiriktamanonirāse kṛte siddhāntīsvāśayamāviṣkaroti ucyata ityādinā
GSP33yaatsi_u:1418: astu vā muktānāmīśvarasya ca mano buddhirūpameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1419: baddhānāṃ tu mana āhaṅkārika mantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutibalādabhyupagantavyameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1421: paraṃ tu tasya na cetanatvaṃ śakyamadhyavasitumiti hārdam //
GSP33yaatsi_u:1423: prāṇavati dehe jīvatīti, tadrahite ca mṛta iti vyavahārātprāṇa eva jīvanakartṛtvājjīva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1427: niḥsparśatvādātmani na kriyā vibhutve 'ṇutve vā saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1435: prāṇavyāpārasya bhuktapītāhārapariṇāmahetutvam ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ dehamāsthitaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:1441: avibhutvenāsyā'tmanaḥ sparśavirahiṇo 'pi prayatnādṛṣṭapreraṇānuguṇyena manasa ivotkrāntigatyādayo yujyanta iti na tannirdeśānāmamuravyārthatā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1446: jaḍatvaṃ ca saṃvido nivartamānaṃ tadapi nivartayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1452: na khalunīlamidamiti pratiyantaḥ tadaivānīlamanidaṃrūpamapi saṃvedanaṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:1453: ataḥ svarūpasatyaiva saṃvidā indriyasannikarṣeṇeva viṣayaḥ prakāśyate /

GSP33yaatsi_u:2373: nedamadhyastatvasādhakaṃ bādhitatvena sopādhikatvādityāśayamantarnidhāya pratibandīmāha nanvātmataye ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:2375: tulyamidaṃ jñātṛtvasyānadhyastatvaṃ ityāha kiṃ bho riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2378: mokṣe jñātṛtvasya nivṛttāvanarthaṃ prasañjayati hantaivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2379: duḥkhanivṛttyā mukteḥ pumarthatvamiti cedānandānubhavanivṛttyānubhavitrahamarthanivṛttyā cāpumarthatvaṃ prasajyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2380: jñātṛtvāderanātmadharmatvāttannivṛttāvapi na pumarthatopaghāto mukteriti śaṅkate nanu jñātṛtvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2382: durmocatvādgranthiḥ, tanniṣṭhameva jñātṛtvaṃ jñānātmanā pariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ vikriyātmakaṃ jaḍapariṇāmatvājjaḍaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2389: ātmatvādananyārthatvādajaḍatvādavikriyatvādvā tannaivaṃ yannaivaṃ yathā deha iti prayogā atra garbhitāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2407: sarvaṃ ca jñeyaṃ jñātnātmana eva bhāsate na jñānamātnāya/ tataśca jñāturevātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyetyāha sarvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2409: ataśca na jñānamātnasya sākṣitvaṃ saṃbhavati, kintu jñātureveti tasyaivātmatvaṃ na jñānamātnasyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2411: na hi kāpilamata iva jñānapariṇāmitvaṃ jñātṛtvamiṣyate śrutyantahārdābhijñaiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2413: saviṣayake dhātvarthe kartṛtāyā āśrayatvarūpatvāt, karmatvasya viṣayatārūpatvavat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2416: śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari kartāśāstrārthavattvā diti hi vedavedāntahārdābhijñāḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2422: evamātmana eva jñātṛtvamahaṃ tvaṃ ca mukhyamityuktvā prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣe buddhyākhye mahattatve tatkārye 'haṅkāre vā jñātṛtvamanupapannamityāha na
GSP33yaatsi_u:2426: mahānahaṅkāro vā na jñātā anātmatvāt pariṇāmitvājjaḍatvātparārthatvādvā dehavaditi prayogaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2432: yena tatsaṃparkāttatna jñātṛtvaṃ tatpratibhānaṃ vā bhavet agnisaṅgādayasi auṣṇyabhānavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2433: sāṃsargiko guṇo doṣo vā tatna tatna jāyate jñāyate ceti jāyeta jñāyeta vetyuktiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2442: saṃvidabhivyañjakatvaprayuktaścāhaṅkārasya saṃvidāśrayatvapratibhāso mukhādyabhivyañjakatvaprayuktaścāhaṅkārasya saṃvidāśrayatvapratibhāso mikhādyabhivyañjakatvaprayukta iva darpaṇādermukhavattvādipratibhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2444: prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣasyaiva, na tvātmana ityāha ata eve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2446: jñātṛtvapratītirbhrāntiḥ, ata eva caitanyamātratayā'tmanaḥ svāpemuktau ca bhānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2451: atra saṃvādatayā sureśvarācāryavacanamu pādatte ātmana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2466: sarvārthaprakāśakaṃ kadācitprakāśate 'tha na, punaḥkadācitprakāśate ityudayāstamayaparyāyavṛttirahitanityaprakāśasvarūpamanubhavātmānaṃ niyamena tadadhīnaprakāśo jaḍo 'haṅkāro 'bhivyanaktīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:2468: na khalu sarvaṃ sādhayataḥ svataḥsiddhasya ca sadānubhavātmanaḥ prakāśakāntarāpekṣā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2475: tathābhūtāśca dinakaramarīcayaḥ sphuṭamupalabhyanta iti na karatalavyaṅgyatvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2476: api ca keyamabhivyakti ? yānubhūtirūpasyātmano 'haṅkāreṇa kriyata ityucyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2482: sa hi vedyagatajñānodayapratibandhakāpanayanena vā dīpeneva santamasanirasanena
GSP33yaatsi_u:2484: jātinijamukhādibodhakasya nayanādeḥ; vittṛgatakalaṅkakṣālanena vā śamadamādineva parāvarātmatattvajñānopāyasyā'gamādeḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2486: ajñānaṃ tu jñānasamānāśrayaviṣayatayā na tadubhayabhāvavirahiṇi bhavadabhimatasākṣiṇi nikṣepamarhati
GSP33yaatsi_u:2488: tathaiva na jātucit jñātṛtvaṃ jñānamātrasyeti na tasyāpyajñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2492: na ca tadviṣayatvamātmatayābhimata syānubhavasyeṣyata iti tatratyamajñānaṃ na kenacitkadāciducchidyeta
GSP33yaatsi_u:2493: jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ cājñānaṃ na jñānotpattipratibandhakamiti śakyaṃ vyapadeṣṭum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2502: niyamena tadvyaṅgyasvarūpasya tadvyañjakatvaṃ hi viruddhamiti proktam/
GSP33yaatsi_u:2504: mithyāpadārthasya pratibhāsādhīnasattākasya pratibhāsābhāve sattāyā eva dirlabhatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2510: uktalakṣaṇātprātikūlyādvādhakopanipātānna mitho vyaṅgyavyañjakatvaṃ saṃvidahaṅkārayoḥ saṃbhavatīti ca tātparyāntaraṃ varṇitaṃ śrīmannigamāntagurucaraṇaistattvaṭīkāyām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2514: tadvya ṅgyasyāpi tadvyañjakatve na virodhaḥ, dṛṣṭatvāditi śaṅkāmapanudati dinakare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2516: saṃhatānāṃ ca teṣāṃ sphuṭaprakāśaḥ svata evetyāha karatalasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2519: abhivyaktiprakārāṇāṃ saṃbhāvitānāṃ prakṛte 'nupapatterapi nāhaṅkārasya tadabhivyañjakatvamityāha api ce tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2522: saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena tadviṣayakajñānajanakatvamapi tadabhivyañjakatvamahaṅkārasya neti prakāśanaprakāśakajñānajanakatvarūpābhivyañjakatvaprakāradvayaṃ dūṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2527: tadanugrahaprakārāḥ prakṛte na saṃbhavantīti vadan anugrahaṃ vikalpayatitāvat sa hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2538: / niṣkāmakarmaṇā śamādinācāpākṛtapāparāgādidoṣasya śuddhacittasyaiva hi śāstreṇa tattvajñānotpattiḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2542: jñānena samānāvāśrayaviṣayau yasyaivaṃbhūtamajñānam, jñānasamānāśrayaṃ jñānasamānaviṣayaṃ ceti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2545: ajñānaṃ hi jñānaprāgabhāvarūpaṃ tatsamānayogakṣemaṃ vānyat jñātṛtvaprasaktiśūnye bhavadabhimate
GSP33yaatsi_u:2573: vyaktestu jātirākāra eveti tathā pratyāyanam; na vyañjakatvaprayuktam ; uktādeva vyabhicārāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:2579: tathā sati sarvasyāpi pratyakṣāderaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgānna kiñcittathyaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2580: tasmājjñātṛtayā siddhyannahamartha eva pratyagātmā; na jñaptimātram /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2582: yattu suṣuptisuktayorjñaptimātratayā sphuraṇam, ahamiti tu na
GSP33yaatsi_u:2583: pratibhātīti; tatra suṣuptau tathāvasthitiḥ purastādeva nirastā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2585: yadi paraṃ parāgarthānanubhavāttamoguṇābhibhavācca na vivicya sphuṭaṃ cakāsti;
GSP33yaatsi_u:2586: bhavadabhimatānubhūtirapi tadānīṃ tathaiva hi prathata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2587: nāhamaham, nāpyarthāntaram, api tvanubhūtimātramajñānasākṣitayāvatiṣṭhata ityevaṃvidhaṃ svāpasamayabhavamanubhavaṃ nahi suptotthitaḥ kaścit parāmṛśannupalabdhacaraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2588: etāvantaṃ kālaṃ na kiñcidahamavediṣamiti parāmarśanādeva tathātvaṃ labhyata iti cet; kathamiva? na kiñciditi nirdeśāditi cet; nanvevamanubhūtipratibhāso 'pi pratyākhyātaḥ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2589: api ca suṣuptisamayasiddhamātmānamahamiti parāmṛśya na kiñcidavediṣaṃmiti tasya vedane pratiṣidhyamāne tātkālikīṃ vittisiddhimahamarthasya cāsiddhimabhidadhāno 'nubhavavirodhamapi na jānāti devānāṃ priyaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2591: nanu māmapyahaṃ na jñātavān prasupta ityasti hi prabodhe pratyayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2592: satyam; sa tu varṇāśramādiviśiṣṭatayā prabodhasamayasaṃvedyamānaṃ dehinaṃ māmityādāya svāpyayāvasthāprasiddhāviśadasvānubhavaikatānāhamarthasya
GSP33yaatsi_u:2596: api ca, ātmā suṣuptau ajñānasākṣitvenā'sta iti hi yauṣmākī sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2605: yatastathā sati vaināśikadarśana ivātmanāśa evāpavargaḥ prakārāntareṇa pratijñātaḥ syāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2606: no khalu ahamiti dharmamātram, yena tadapagame 'pyavidyānivṛttyāmivātmanaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2609: jñānamapi hi taddharmatvena tasyaiva prakāśate jñānaṃ me jātamiti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2611: anyaśca-yaḥ sāṃsārikaduḥkhaiḥ duḥkhitvenā'tmānaṃ tattvatobhrāntyā vā pratyeti duḥkhyahamiti, saḥ sarvamidamaniṣṭajātaṃ kathamahamapunarūdayapanudyāvyākulaḥ svastho bhūyāsamiti sañjātamumukṣaḥ tatsādhane pravartate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2614: tataścāsambhavadadhikāritayā sarva eva vedāntavidhayaḥ sarvāṇi ca mokṣaśāstrāṇi prāmāṇyādeva pracyaveran /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2616: 'vasthāsyata iti cet, kimataḥ? na hi mayi naṣṭe 'pi ko 'pi prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti kaścitprekṣāvān prayasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2617: etena tadapi parāstam, asmatpratyaye yo 'nidamaṃśaḥ cidekarasaḥ prakāśaḥ sa ātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2618: tasmiṃstadbalanirbhāsitatayā lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha evāhaṃ jānāmīti sidhyannartha iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2620: ahaṃ jānāmīti sidhyaścetano suṣmadartha iti mātā bandhyetivadvyāhatārthaṃvacaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2625: sa ca muktāvapyātmane 'hamityeva prakāśate, svasmai prakāśamānatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2626: yo yaḥ svasmai prakāśate sa sarvo 'hamityeva prakāśamānodṛṣṭaḥ, yathā tathāvabhāsamānatvenobhayavādisaṃmataḥ saṃsāryātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2627: yaḥ punarahamiti na cakāsti nāsau svasmai prakāśate, yathā ghaṭādiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2636: śrayate hi 'taddhaitatpaśyan ṛṣirvāmadevaḥ pratipede ahaṃ manurabhavaṃ suryaśca ahameva ca vartāmi bhaviṣyāmī'tyādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2638: devatāḥ' 'bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' 'sar ikṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti', tathā-
GSP33yaatsi_u:2640: ato 'smiloke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ' // 'teṣāmahaṃ samuddhartā ' 'ahaṃ bījapradaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2645: bahumantavyajanāvadhīraṇahetuścāsau garvāparaparyāyaḥ tatra tatra śāstreṣu prāyaśoheyatayopadiśyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:2647: anātmani tu śarīre bhavantī avidyeti yuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2657: svagatakalmaṣasya svenaiva kevalena nivartanāyogānna tṛtīyo 'pi kalpaḥ kalpata ityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2658: evaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nirasya parābhimataṃ vyañjakasvabhāvamapi nirasyati nace ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2659: pradīpo hi ghaṭādeḥ prakāśako na svavṛttitayā taṃ prakāśayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2660: na khalvevaṃ pratītiḥ pradīpe ghaṭa iti, pradīpo ghaṭavāniti vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2661: kintu yathāvasthitaveṣeṇaiva bhūtale ghaṭa itīti bhavadukte niyame
GSP33yaatsi_u:2665: jñānasāmagrīprayojyatvaṃ jñānabhāsakasāmagrībhāsyatvaṃ ca prāmāṇyasyotpattau jñaptau ca svatastvam
GSP33yaatsi_u:2682: darpaṇādi pratihatagateścākṣuṣatejasaḥ pratinivṛtya mukhābhimukhatayā prasaraṇameva mukhasyānyathāpratītau doṣarūpaṃ prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2689: pramāṇādhīnapramitāvahamarthasyāpi hetutvāt pramāṇadoṣasaṃpādakatve tasya na kiñcidapi yathārthajñānaṃ saṃbhavetpramāṇajanyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2695: atha svāpe muktau cāhamarthasya bhānaṃ nāsti, tannāhamarthasyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti paramatamanūdya nirasyati yattu suṣuptī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2705: parāgarthānanubhavādvivicya bhānaṃ na, tamoguṇābhibhavācca sphuṭaṃ tanneti
GSP33yaatsi_u:2708: viśadabhānābhāve 'pi sūkṣmatayāhamarthasya bhānaṃ parābhimatasaṃvida iva svāpe 'stīti ca hārdam
GSP33yaatsi_u:2720: kiñcidityahamarthasyevāsaṅkocātsaṃvido 'pi kroḍīkārāt saṃvinmātrasyāpi bhānaṃ bhavatāṃ tadābhimataṃ na siddhyedityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2721: nanu kiñciditi jaḍamātrasya parāmarśa iti cettarhyahamarthasyāpi na niṣedhaḥ pratyaktvenājaḍatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2722: yadvā jñeyamātrasya kiñciditi parāmarśo na jñānasyeti cettulyanayena jñāturapi na parāmarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2727: na hi bhūtale ghaṭo nāstītyasya ghaṭasadbhāvabhūtalaniṣedhaviṣayakatvaṃ kasyacinmatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2730: nanu saviṣayasaṃvinniṣedhe 'pi nirviśeṣasaṃvitprakāśe na virodha ityatrāha nirviṣaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2732: tacca dharmabhūtaṃ naiva tadā prakāśata iti tu siddhāntinaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2733: svāpe 'hamarthānanubhave pratisandhānāntaraṃ pramāṇatvena śaṅkate nanu mām iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2742: svāpe na jñānasya prakāśaḥ, kintu jñātṛsvarūpasyaiveti dyotanāyedamuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2745: ajñānasākṣitvenā'tmā svāpe prakāśata iti parapakṣarītyāpi tadāhamarthasya bhānamavarjanīyamityāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2746: sākṣāddraṣṭari saṃjñāyām iti sākṣātkartaryeva hi sākṣiśabdo 'nuśiṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2747: sa ca jñātṛtvena pratī to 'hamartha eveti ahamajña ityajñānasākṣitayā svāpe 'hamarthabhānaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2762: ahamarthasya dharmamātratve tannivṛttāvapi muktau ātmā anuvartate iti bhavatkathanaṃ sādhīyo bhavet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2766: dharmatayā pramīyamāṇasya jñānasya na svatantrātmatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2768: bahiraṅgasyendriyādeḥ sutarāṃ na sambhāvitamātmatvamityāha kā kathe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2769: jñātṛtayā pramīyamāṇādahamarthādanyasya na kasyāpyātmatvaṃ yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2771: sukhaduḥkhabhoktṛtvaṃ duḥkhatrayābhighātāt mumukṣutvaṃ ca jñāturahamarthasyaiva, sa cet svasyaiva vināśaṃ muktau jānīyāt na tasyai spṛhayet /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2774: tathāca jñāpakatayānuṣṭhāpakatayā ca prāmāṇyaṃ bhajatāṃ mokṣaśāstrāṇāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2776: yathā dehagehādyupalakṣitaḥ pṛthivībhāgaḥ sthāsyatīti svadehagehanāśe na pravarteta svayameva kaścit prekṣāpūrvakārī, evamahamarthopalakṣitaḥ prakāśaḥ sthāsyatīti buddhyā na svanāśāya mokṣāya jñātāhamarthaḥ pravarteteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2777: cittvāt svayaṃprakāśatvam, tataḥ pratyaktvaṃ, tataścātmatvaṃ cito jñānasyaiva, na tu tadbhinnasyāhamarthasyeti pakṣaṃ pratikṣipati etene ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:2778: / ahaṃ jānāmīti pratyaye caitanyaikarūpaḥ parāgbhinnaḥ pratyak yaḥ jānāmīti pratīyate, saḥ prakāśa evātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2779: tasminnadhiṣṭhāne bhāsamānaḥ tadadhīnaprakāśaḥ ahamartho yuṣmadarthalakṣaṇa eva-parāgarthasvarūpaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2781: asvaprakāśatvaṃ, lakṣaṇato yuṣmadartha eveti parāktvaṃ cāhamarthasyānātmatve liṅgamuktam lakṣaṇataḥ-svarūpataḥ; yadvā asvayaṃprakāśatvaliṅgāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2782: jñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ jñānatvāt, jñānaṃ pratyak svayaṃprakāśatvāt, jñānamātmā pratyaktvāditi prayogatrayam, ahamartho na svayaṃprakāśaḥcidbhinnatvāt, ahamarthaḥ parāk anyādhīnaprakāśatvāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2783: ahamartho nātmā parāktvā diti prayogatrayaṃ cātragarbhitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2787: ahamartho yuṣmadartha iti pratijñāvākye virodhamāha aham iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2789: nanu yuṣmadartha iti ḷ ākṣaṇikaṃ parāktvaparam
GSP33yaatsi_u:2794: caitanyadharmakatvāt, yannaivaṃ yannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2797: muktāvahamarthasya sadbhāve pūrvaṃ tarka uktaḥ/ atha tadā muktasyāhantvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:2798: bhāne 'numānaṃ samagrāṅgakanyāyamukhena prapañcayati sa ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2800: evaṃ bhāsamānatve- ahantvena bhāsamānatve muktasya saṃsāriṇa ivājñatvādi nāpādayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2802: / muktātmā ajñānavān saṃsaraṇadharmavān vā ahantvena bhāsamānatvāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:2805: kintu ahantvena bhāseta yadi muktātmā, tarhyajñānādimān syāditi prasañjanameva kriyata iti cettatrāpyāha atadupādhitvā diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2814: etatpratyayeti vā, ahaṃpratyayeti vā pāṭhaḥ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2821: kleśakarmavipākāśayairaparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaviśeṣar iśvara iti hi yogatantre prasiddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2822: sarvadā sarvathāvidyārahitasyeśvarasyāhamiti svātmani pratyayo nāvidyādimūlaḥ saṃbhavediti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2825: paropādhiprayuktaḥ, kintu svarūpaprayukta eveti pradarśanāya sṛṣṭisaṅkalpavākyopādānam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2828: naca sopādhirīśvaro 'ntaryāmī muktaprāpyo vā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2829: tathā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgaratārakaṃ śuddhameva svarūpaṃ bhagavato 'hamiti nirdiṣṭaṃ teṣāmaha mityatra
GSP33yaatsi_u:2832: ahaṃśabditaṃ jagatkāraṇasvarūpaṃ nājñānopahitaṃ, na vā jñānamātram, kintu sarvajñamiti jñāpanāya copāttaṃ vedāham iti vacanam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2835: nanvevamahambhāvasyā'tmasvarūpatve 'haṅkārasya kṣetrāntarbhāvavacanaṃ tyājyatvapratipādanaṃ ca gītāsthaṃ kathamityatrā'ha evaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2839: tathā cānahami dehe 'hamabhimānaheturanātmani ātmabhramaheturahaṅkāraḥ kṣetrāntargatatvenopadiṣṭa iti phalitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2840: atha ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpam iti tyājyatvenoktasyāhaṅkārasyābhijanādinimittadurabhimānamūlagarvarūpatvamāha bahumantavye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2845: cvyarthamanantarbhāvya tu vyutpanno 'haṅkāra iti ātmani ahaṃ buddhivācīti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2850: ātmanyeṣa na doṣāya śabdo 'hamiti yo dvija /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2858: dehātmabhramākāraparīkṣāto 'pi svīkāryamahamarthatvamātmana ityāha na ca jñaptī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2875: na khalu sukhaduḥkhecchādayo vidyamānā api kadācidamavabhāsamānā bhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2879: yadi matam-avyabhicaritaprakāśo 'pi sukhādiranyasmai prakāśata iti ghaṭa iva jaḍatāṃ nātivartate, tenānātmeti; jñānaṃ vā kiṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2880: svasmai prakāśate? anyasyaiva hi tadapi jānato 'hamarthasya prathate 'haṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2883: ataḥ sattayaiva svamātmānaṃ prati sidhyannajaḍo 'hamartha evātmā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2885: ata eva hi svāśrayacetanaṃ prati prakaṭatā, itaraṃ pratyaprakaṭatā ca jñānasya sukhaduḥkhaderiva
GSP33yaatsi_u:2888: iti jñānātmatvasādhakājaḍatvadūṣaṇam na ca jñānena sahopalambhaniyamo 'hamarthasyārthāntaratāṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2890: tadapi hi tena niyatena sahopalambhamityahamarthādanarthāntaraṃ mithyārūpamevā'padyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2892: na ca viśeṣamātraṃ nirdhūtanikhilaviṣayaviśeṣopaśleṣaṃ vā vittimātramasti, yena sahopalambhaniyamaḥ saṃvediturabhidhīyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2897: dvayorhyekakriyānupraveśe sahaśabdaḥ, śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatyācārya iti yathā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2898: api ca nilataddhiyoriti dve upādāya abheda ityekatvavidhiḥ savitrīvandhyātvavidhiriva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2899: anekāntaśca saṃvidi pratiṣidhyamānairjaḍatvādibhiḥ; sarvajñajñānena sahopalambhaniyamabhāgibhiḥ saṃsārijñānaiśca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2903: bhavatu niyamenaikajñānasiddhatvaṃ jñānajñeyajñātṛṇām, mā ca bhūdabhedaḥ; ko virodhaḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:2910: dehātmabhramarūpāvidyāsaṅgateśca jñātāhamartha evātmā, sa ca sarvadāhamiti
GSP33yaatsi_u:2921: avyabhicaritaḥ-niyataḥ prakāśo yasyāḥ, evaṃbhūtā sattā yasya,
GSP33yaatsi_u:2924: tathā satī ti/ anātmasu sukhādiṣvapi niruktājaḍatvasya sattvāt vyabhicāra ityuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33yaatsi_u:2926: yasya svasattayaiva prakāśaḥ, tatsvasattāprayuktaprakāśam, tattā jaḍatvamityapi pradīpādau vyabhicāri /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2928: nanu cakṣurāderapekṣāstyeva tatreti cet; astu nāma; tāvatā svasattāprayuktatāyā anapāyāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:2938: tatprakāśaṃ nityamabhyupagacchataḥ tasya svasattāprayuktatvakīrtanaṃ viruddhaṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2940: svasmai svayaṃ bhāsamānatvarūpamajaḍatvamātmatve sādhakaṃ tu svarūpāsiddhamityāha yadi matam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2946: nahi svāśrayādanyasmai svaviṣayaṃ prakāśayati jñānaṃ, svayaṃ vā prakāśate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2948: svasmai svayaṃ bhāsa mānatvamahamarthasyaiveti sa evātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2954: saṃvida ātmatvamādhakamajaḍatvaṃ pradūṣya jñātrādeḥ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ dūṣayati naca jñānene ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2959: ahamarthena sahaivopalambhaṃ saṃvida upapādayati tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2964: tadupalambhavyāpyopalambhavattvarūpo hi sahopalambhaniyamaḥ paraiḥ tadabhedasādhako mataḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2970: tatrādye 'siddhiḥ, cākṣuṣādijñānaprakāśamantarāpi ahamarthasya jñānāntaraprakāśe prakāśamānatvāditi pratyekaṃ vyabhicāradarśanā dityuktam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2972: / na nirviśeṣaṃ sāmānyam iti nyāyāccākṣuṣādivyatiriktaṃ jñānaviśeṣamātraṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2981: sāhityasya bhedaniyatatvātsahaivopalambhamānatvahetuvyapadeśa eva bhedavyapadeśarūpa iti tena saṃvidahamarthayoraikyasādhane pratijñāhetuvākyayorvirodha ekaṃ dvitvāditivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2983: sahopalambhaniyamādabhedo nīlataddhiyo rityevaṃ hi teṣāṃ pratijñā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2990: tathā ca saṃvidā sahopalambhaniyamabhājāṃ jaḍatvamūrtatvādīnāṃ saṃvidabhede saṃvido jaḍatvamūrtatvādiprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:2993: evaṃ sarva jñasya baddhajñānānāmupalambhe niyamena buddhajñānamapyupalamyate, teṣāṃ buddhajñānamahopalambhānāṃ buddhajñānābhede buddhasya baddhatvāpattiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:2995: abhedasādhakaṃ hetvantaramapi tulyarītyā nirasyati niyamenaike ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3014: naca pratiyoginaḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ vā bhedasyā'parokṣye tvapekṣitavyam, siddhimātreṇa tadupapattāvaprayojakatvena tadviśeṣasyānākṣepāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3016: pratiyogini bhāvāḥ svarūpata eva vilakṣaṇāḥ pratyakṣyanta iti sarvalokasvasākṣikametat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3017: nanu jīvato bhedapratyakṣasya śirasi padanidhānena sahopalambhaniyamasyābhedena pratibandhagrahaṇamiti kathamiva tatastadvādhasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3020: tatra hi kḷptakāraṇadoṣānuvṛttau satyāṃ jāyamāno 'parokṣāvabhāso na niravadyapratyakṣapūrvakamanumānaṃ bādhitumarhati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3021: tathāhi-aciranirvāpitāropiteṣvekavartibhāgavartiṣu bahuṣudīpeṣu tadbhedādarśinaḥ susadṛśatayā sa evāyamiti smṛtirupajāyate iti dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3024: / tathaikanānātvapratyayaḥ svataḥprāptendriyavṛttiviparyayaprayuktaḥ samasamayopajāyamānānekānavadyapratyakṣapratikṣiptaviṣayaścadvicandrādau dṛṣṭa iti nāsau tatraikatvānumānamabhibhavituṃ prabhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3026: na copalabdhisāhityaniyamādeva tathātvamatrānumeyamiti yuktam, vipakṣe bādhakānupalabdheḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3035: aprakāśātmanaśca nīlādeḥ prakāśa ityanubhavasiddhatvānna samarthanāntaraṃ prārthayate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3040: ātmā tu svatantro jñātā ahamiti pratyātmaṃ prathate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3045: ata eva hi cchandogāḥ-'atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā' ityādyāmananti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3047: vājasaneyinaḥ 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3048: atra hi yo 'yaṃ sarvalokānubhavasiddho vividhaviṣayavedanapracuraḥ prāṇeṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:3049: prerakatayā sthito hṛdayāyatane antarjyotiḥ ahamiti pratyaktvena
GSP33yaatsi_u:3051: 'eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ'
GSP33yaatsi_u:3053: tathā 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāditi' 'na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām' 'sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ nopajanaṃ smarannidaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3054: śarīram' 'evamevāsya paridraṣṭurimāḥ ṣoḍaśakalāḥ puruṣāyaṇāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpyāstaṃ gacchanti' 'tasmāddhā etasmānmanomayādanyo 'ntara ātmā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3056: 'satyaṃ jñāna' mityatrāpi brahmalakṣaṇanirdeśe jñānaśabdo na jñānamātravacanaḥ ; api tu tadvadvacanaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3059: matvarthīyācpratyayāntatve tathātvaṃ ghaṭate; nānyathetyetat paramātmanirūpaṇe atinipuṇamupapādayiṣyāmaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3061: 'prajñānaṃ brahye'tyuktvā 'sa etena prājñenātmanā' iti prakṛṣṭajñānavantameveśvaraṃ darśayati
GSP33yaatsi_u:3064: kiṃ punarasmin dehādivyatirekiṇi cetane pratyagātmani pramāṇam? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3079: evamāśrayamātramupasthāpayanto 'nvayavyatirekiṇo hetavaḥ dravyāntaraguṇatvaṃ ca pratyācakṣāṇaiḥ kevalavyatirekisādhanairātmagocaratayā niyamyante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3080: tathā hi bhavati-icchādayo na mahābhūtaguṇāḥ, svātmana eva pratyakṣatvāt;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3085: dikkālamanāṃsi punaḥ na viśeṣaguṇavanti; nāpi tadguṇānāṃ pratyakṣatvamiti na teṣāmapi guṇāḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3087: tenecchādayo na śarīraguṇāḥ tadguṇabhāvāpavādapramāṇavattve sati guṇatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3089: bhavanti, te yathoktasādhanā api na bhavanti; yathā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3091: vimatipadāspadebhyaḥ śarīrādibhyor'thāntaraguṇā icchādaya iti vā pratijñā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3094: sāmānyena vānvayaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ-yo yadguṇabhāvāpavādakapramāṇavattve sati guṇaḥ, sa
GSP33yaatsi_u:3095: tator'thāntarasya guṇaḥ; yathā pṛthivyādibhyaḥ śabda iti ākāśasiddhivadātmasiddhiriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3104: naca sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvadarśanamātreṇa sādhyānvitasvabhāvatvaṃ śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3108: sādhanābhāvaprayuktaḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ, kiṃ vā nimittāntaraprayukta iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3117: pratyakṣaṃ ca śarīrasya saṅghātatvaṃ, bhūtānāṃ ca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3133: tathā dehāderavyaktāntasya kṛtsnsya triguṇātmakatayātyantaduḥkhopaśamanalakṣaṇamokṣadaśānupapatteḥ tadarthaṃ ca śāstrāṇāṃ mahādhiyāṃ ca pravṛtterasti dehādivyatirikto 'saṃhataḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3146: tacca tadartham; yadyenopakriyate kriyate vā, yaccopakaroti karoti vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3147: na ca tathā sāṅkhyapuruṣa iti kataṃ tasya saṅghātaṃ prati paratvam ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:3150: manyata iti cet; kāmaṃ manyatām; kimāyātamupakāryatvasya? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3151: na khalu bālāstalamalinatādimattayā gaganamabhimanyanta iti tasya tathātvaṃ bhavati
GSP33yaatsi_u:3152: api ca tathāvidhabhramo 'pi kasya kathamudayata iti vivecanīyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3156: / antaḥkaraṇaṃ tu buddhyaparaparibhāṣābhidhānamacetanatayā tanuriva na bhrāmyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3157: acidapi svacchatayā citicchāyāpannaṃ cetanāyata iti cet; na;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3163: cetanatvena sarūpatvamiti cet; na; citireva hi te puruṣaḥ, na cetayitā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3165: tatrabhavān patañjaliḥ " yadā citireva puruṣaḥ kimatra kena vyapadiśyata "
GSP33yaatsi_u:3167: ajaḍāyamānatvamivārtha iti cet; ajaḍatvamapi na jñātṛtvā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3170: api ca citisannidhānādhīnāṃ buddhisiddhimabhidadhānaḥ kathamiva tadajaḍimānaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3173: yaducyate-nirvikārāyāpi puṃse tatsannidhimahimasamutthāpitapramāṇaviparyayādivicitravṛttibhedaṃ svāntameva svavṛttiṃ viṣayaviśeṣāṃścopadarśayati, sāmantacakramiva parākramīyaḥ pratibalavilolanādivṛttīḥ svāmine, tataḥ sākṣī bhoktā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3174: cāpadiśyate, rājeti vikramī vijayī ceti; tadanupapannam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3176: naca dṛśimātrātmavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ tadupajīvināṃ ca pracchannānāṃ draṣṭṛtvaṃ vāstavamasti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3179: rājā tu sāmānyato viśeṣato vā teṣu karmasvamātyān niyuñjānaḥ tatphalamaiśvaryādi cāśruvānaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3180: svasvāmibhāvahetukrayapratigrahajananādi- vyāpārayogī na niṣkriyasyānādheyātiśayasya puṃso nidarśanamiti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3182: sthūlo 'haṃ, gacchābhyahamityādipratyakṣamṛditaviṣayatayā prasiddhaivātītakālatā vyatorekānumānabhedānāmityānumānikīmapyātmasiddhimaśraddadhānāḥ śrautīmeva tāṃ śrotiyāḥ saṅgirante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3187: kadācit' 'jīvāpetaṃ vāvakiledaṃ mriyate' 'na hi vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorapahatirasti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3188: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'
GSP33yaatsi_u:3195: bhāraḥ prakṣipyate? anumānāgamādyaśeṣapramāṇamūlabhūtena pratyakṣeṇaiva hyenaṃ pratipadyāmahe
GSP33yaatsi_u:3196: mamedaṃ śarīram, idamahaṃ jānāmīti ghaṭādidṛśyebhya ivāyaṃ draṣṭā dehādapi pṛthagbhūtaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3201: na cendriyāṇi rūpādivyatirekiṇi niratiśayasūkṣme pratīci parāgartha iva sannikarṣeṇa jñānaṃ janayitumarhanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3206: utāho tadabhedataḥ-saṃvidabhinnatvāt prakāśamanurudhyate iti saṃdehānnīlatadviyorabhedo 'śakyanirṇaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3208: idaṃ ca kiṃ saṃvidabhedaprayuktamuta svaprakāśe nīlāderjaḍasya svaprakāśasaṃvidapekṣāprayuktamiti viśaye yāvadabhedaprayuktatvanirṇayo na
GSP33yaatsi_u:3219: kintu bodhyayoreva tathābhūtayorabheda iṣyatāṃ guṇaguṇiprabhṛtyoḥ kathañcidityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3225: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti hi sphuṭo jñeyajñātṛjñānānāṃ bhedapratibhāsaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3230: prakṛte saṃvido jñānāntarāgocaratvena svayaṃprakāśatvāttadbhedapratyakṣaṃ jñātari na saṃbhavatīti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3242: pratiyoginaḥ prakṛte vedanasya prakāśastu svata evāsti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3245: sa ca pratiyogyanavabhāse 'pi bhāsata evotyāha anavabhāsamāna iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3246: tathā ca jñāturahantvena bhānameva saṃvidbhedagrahaṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3253: tattadasādhāraṇa dharmasyaivetarabhedarūpatvāttasya ca dharmiṇi prathamakṣaṇa eva gṛhīteḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3254: ata evāpūrvavastudarśane vilakṣaṇo 'yaṃ kaścana padārtha iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3255: bhedapratītirlokasammatā svānubhavasiddhā ca nāpahnavārhā iti sarvalokasvasākṣika mityuktam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3266: tena cābhedānumāne pratyakṣe bhedagrahaṇāṃśobhramalakṣaṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3273: na pratyakṣatvamanumānatvaṃ vā bādhyatve bādhakatve vā prayojakam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3275: tathā ca yathā jvālābhedānumānamadośamūlaṃ bādhakam, jvālaikyapratyakṣaṃ tu sādṛśyadoṣamūlaṃ bādhyaṃ bhavati; naivaṃ prakṛte jñātṛjñeyajñānabhedagrahasya doṣamūlatvamiti samuditāśayaḥ jvālaikyapratyakṣe kḷptakāraṇadoṣānuvṛttimupapādayati tathāhī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3278: / nirvāpaṇapunaruddīpanadraṣṭuśca jvālayorbhedaprtyakṣaṃ vartata iti tena bādhitatvamapi nirvāpaṇādyadraṣṭṛniṣṭha jvālayokyapratyakṣe viva kṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3286: evaṃ pūrvottaradīpajvālayorbhede siddhe sajātīyadīpadhārāyāṃ bhedāgrahātsādṛśyarūpadoṣadarśanāccaikyabhrama iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3291: dṛṣṭāntitāt dārṣṭāntike vaiṣamyamupapādayati na caivam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3292: jñātṛjñānajñeyabhedanirūpitalaukikaviṣayitāśālī ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti sākṣātkāraḥ doṣamūlaḥ, abhedapratyakṣabādhito vā naiva dṛśyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3294: viparītaṃ kasmānna bhavatītyatrāha na copalabdhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3297: vipakṣe bādhakatarkavirahādvyāptyasiddhyāsiddhamabhedānumānaṃ na jñānajñātṛjñeyabhedapratyakṣe bādhakatvena śakyaśaṅkamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3300: atra bādhakapratyayo 'pi nāsti candradvitvabhrama ivetyāha yogyānupalambhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3301: na caivamihe ti vākyābhipretamanena vākyadvayena vivṛtam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3302: saṃvidadhīne tivākyoktaṃ prapañcayati api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3305: nanu saṃvidamantarāpi viṣayādiḥ sidhyatvityatrāha na ca bhedo 'pī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3309: yadvā sahopalambhaniyamasyābhedasādhakatve svavyāghātamapyāha na ca bhedopī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3311: niruktahetorbhedasyāpi saṃvidabhede bhedaghaṭito heturapi na sidhyediti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3312: yadvā bhavadabhimataḥ saṃvidāṃ bhedopi na sidhyediti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3313: evaṃ prakaṭasaugatābhimataṃ saṃvidabhedasādhakaṃ sahopalambhaniyamaṃ pradūṣya pracchannasaugatābhimataṃ prakāśasvabhāvatvamapi dūṣayati aprakāśe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3315: anena jñeyasya jñānābhedānumāne pratyakṣabādho, hetoḥ pakṣe 'siddhiśca
GSP33yaatsi_u:3317: yadyapi jaḍatvānna prakāśasvabhāvatvaṃ jñeyasya, athāpi svayaṃprakāśajñānasaṃbandhātkādācitkaprakāśo ghaṭate ghaṭāderiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3318: jñātā jñānābhinnaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvādityatra tu heturupagamyate, na sādhyamityāha na ca tāvate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3325: dhārāvāhikavijñānamekaṃ jñānaṃ mataṃ hi naḥ iti pakṣe tu svarūpata evānuvartamānaṃ yāvadviṣayāntarasaṃcāramiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3328: nanvevaṃ jñānabhinnatve ātmano jñānamiti vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha yadī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3333: jñānaśabdenābhilapyamānamātmasvarūpaṃ jñānatulyameva, na tu jñāptimātratayā mukhyaṃ jñānamityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3336: tataśca jñāturātmano jñānābhedānumānaṃ parābhimataṃ prabalapratyakṣabādhitamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3348: muktidaśāyāṃ jñānābhāvaśrutirheyadarśanābhāvapareti na paśya ityādi vyavasthāpayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3350: bhagavadvibhūtitayā hi sarvasya svānukūlatvena darśanaṃ tadā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3353: sa tatra paryetī tyādi nopajanaṃ smaran ityantamatrodāhāryat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3356: evaṃ jñātṛtvamātmano vyavasthāpya paramātmano 'pi tadvyavasthāpayati satyam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3368: dehendriyamanaḥ prāṇadhībhyo 'nya iti pratijñātātmasvarūpanirūpaṇamupasaṃharati tatsiddham iti //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3369: atha ananyasādhana iti pratijñātaṃ svayaṃprakāśatvamātmanaḥ samarthayituṃ pramāṇaparīkṣāmupakramate kiṃ puna rityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3371: yadyapyahaṃ jānāmīti pratyakṣameva tatra pramāṇaṃ sambhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3373: athāpi vilakṣaṇātmaviṣayatvaṃ pratyakṣasyedaṃ pramāṇamatraivaṃ pravartitumarhatītyevaṃ sāmagrīnirūpaṇādyātmakena tarkeṇaiva vyavasthāpyamityāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3375: icchādi vilakṣaṇātmano 'numāpakaṃ yadāha, ato 'numānameva pramāṇaṃ tatretyakṣapādāśayo
GSP33yaatsi_u:3379: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ- vyāptigrahasya sahacāradarśanamūlakatvena vilakṣaṇātmanā sahacāradarśane icchādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva tasya siddheḥ kṛtamanumānena /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3394: atra hetuṃ sādhayati guṇatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3395: padārthatvena dravyādyanyatamatve prāpte dravyādibhedakānumānato dravyatvādivyudāse dravyādibhedaviśiṣṭaṃ padārthatvameva pariśiṣyamāṇaṃ guṇatvaṃ vyavasthāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3403: na karma, saṃyogavibhāgayoranapekṣakāraṇatvābhāvāt, na dravyaṃ asaṃyogitvāditi vā heturvācyaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3404: guṇatvaṃ prasādhya viśeṣaguṇatvaṃ prasādhayati viśeṣe ti/ rūpatvādau vyabhi cārasya vāraṇāyānityatve satīti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3414: parantu prabhātvajāteḥ prāmāṇikatve vāyoḥ spārśanopagame vā guṇatvadalamāvaśyakameveti bodhyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3426: icchādayo na dikkālamanoguṇāḥ, viśeṣaguṇatvāt, pratyakṣatvādvā; ye punardigādiguṇāḥ saṅkhyādayaḥ, na te pratyakṣā, viśeṣaguṇā vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3437: na caivaṃ sādhyavyatirekasyāpyanumānātpūrvamaprasiddhyā vyatirekyudāharaṇaṃ vā kathaṃ ghaṭata iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3439: anvayavyāptirvā sāmānyamukhī sambhavatītyāha sāmānyato ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3442: evaṃ ca kevalavyatirekyanupagame 'pi na kṣatiriti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3443: naiyāyikābhimatāṃ vilakṣaṇātmasiddhimānumānikīṃ pratikṣipanti śrotriyāḥ idamapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3444: anvayināśrayamātrasya siddhāvapi kevalavyatirekiṇā'śrayaviśeṣaḥ setsyatītyatrāha kevale ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3448: pakṣamātravṛttihetorasādhāraṇasya sādhyasahacāragrahavirahādagṛhītavyāptikasya yathā na gamakatvam, evaṃ kevalavyatirekiṇo 'pi vyāptigrahāyogāt na gamakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3450: kevalavyatirekiṇi tu sapakṣasyaiva virahānna doṣa iti cet; maivam; kevalavyatirekiṇi sādhyasya prasiddhirasti na vānumānātpūrvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3451: asti cedyatra prasiddhiḥ tatra hetoḥ sattve 'nvayitvam, asattve tu asādhāraṇatvameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3452: nāsti cet sādhyavyatirekasyāpyaprasiddheḥ kevalavyatirekitvamapi durghaṭamiti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3459: anvayavyatirekiṇi ubhayavidhasahacāradarśanādvyāptigrahasya dṛṣṭeḥ sādhyahetvo sahacārādarśanātkevalavyatirekiṇo 'sādhakatvaṃ cedabhimatam, tarhi sādhyābhāvasādhanābhāvayoḥ sahacārādarśanātkevalānvayino 'pyasādhakatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3462: kasmiṃściddeśe kāle vā hetuḥ sādhyamantarāpi prayojakāntarāt syāditi deśakālaviśeṣāntarbhāveṇa śaṅkitopādheranukūlatarkeṇa nivartane sati sādhyahetvoḥ sahacāradarśanamātrato 'pi anvayavyāptirniścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3466: vyatirekavyāptigraha eva vyatirekasahacāragrahasyāpekṣayā kevalānvayini anvayavyāptigrahasya vyatirekāprasiddhāvapi nānupapattiriti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3467: vipakṣasattksyaivāprasiddhyaiva rūpapañcakasampattiḥ kevalānvayina iti cāśayaḥ siddhāntinām
GSP33yaatsi_u:3468: nanvevaṃ sādhyasādhanavyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyatirekavyāptigraha upapadyata iti śaṅkate na ca sādhanābhāva iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3472: vyatirekiṇoḥ sādhyasādhanayoradhikaraṇapekṣayā tadabhāvādhikaraṇānāmānantyāt kalayāṃ'śena kkacidapi sādhyābhāvavati hetorvṛttau vyatirekasāhacaryaniyamalakṣaṇavyatirekavyāpterasambhavādityarthaḥ vyatirekisādhyasādhanavataḥ parimitatvena kvacitkārtsnyena grahaṇamapi sambhavediti ca hārdam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3473: nanu yāvatsu pratyakṣeṣvadhikaraṇeṣu vyatirekayoḥ sahacāradarśanata eva vyāptirniścīyetetyatrāha sandehe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3476: 'stu, hetvabhāvo māstviti śaṅkāyāṃ ca na sādhanābhāvavyāpyatvaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3478: sādhyasyā sādhananīmittatvasādhananiyatasvabhāvatvādyanyathānupapattilakṣaṇatarkabalācchaṅkānivāraṇaṃ ca sādhyasādhanayoḥ sahacāradarśanamūlahetuhetumadbhāvādyavadhāraṇamantarā na ghaṭata iti kevalavyatirekyasiddhiriti ca hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3479: viśiṣṭahetunā pṛthivyādivyatiriktaguṇatvānumāne ca sādhyāprasiddhimāha pṛthivyādibhya iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3483: niruktasamavetatvasya guṇakriyābhinna eva prasiddherguṇe jñānādau tatsādhanāyogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3487: vilakṣaṇātmasādhakatvena sāṅkhyābhimatāneva hetūn prathamaṃ vivṛṇumahe śiṣyavaiśadyāya kṣepasaukaryāya ceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3500: / anāhaṅkārikatvena saṅghātatvasya bhūtabhautikeṣu, saṃhataparārthatvena ca gehaśayyādiṣu
GSP33yaatsi_u:3506: ahaṅkāravṛttau satyāmevendriyāṇāṃ manaḥparyantānāṃ vṛtterdarśanāttadabhāve ca svāpe 'darśanādāhaṅkārikatvaṃ teṣāmavasīyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3508: āgamaśca devā vaikārikā daśa, ekādaśaṃ manaśce ti smṛtirūpaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3517: asaṃhatasyāpyātmanaścetanatvādeva bhoktṛtvasyopapatteḥ bhoktatvalakṣaṇe paratve prādhānye saṅghātatvasyāprayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3518: yadi saṅghātatvasya paratve prayojakatvaṃ syāttarhi saṃhataparārthatvena vyāptiḥ sambhavennāma saṅghātatvasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3521: tathā ca saṃhataparārthatve saṅghātatvasya vyāpyatvāsiddhatvamiti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3523: saṅghātatvasya parārthatvena vyāptistu pramāṇāntaravirodhābhāvātprasetsyatītyāha na ca pramāṇāntare
GSP33yaatsi_u:3527: traiguṇyaviparyayaḥ atraiguṇyātmakatvarūpo mantavya ityuktam asaṃhata iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3543: evaṃ sukhenānukūlanīyasya duḥkhena pratikūlanīyasya vā bhoktuḥ triguṇatve tasyāpi anukūlapratikūlavedanīyatvasya prāpteranukūlanīyapratikūlanīyāntarāpādakatvādanavasthāprasaṅga ityatriguṇatvameṣṭavyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3545: kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteśce tyaṃśaṃ vivṛṇoti tathā dehāde riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3549: yā yā phalaviśeṣasādhanaprekṣāvatpravṛttiḥ sā sā tattatphalaprāptiyogyātmatattvajñānapūrvikā, yathā svargasādhanapravṛttiriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3550: dehādeḥ pradhānaparyantasya pariṇāmasvabhāvasya triguṇasya kaivalyānupapattijñānācca vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //
GSP33yaatsi_u:3551: vilakṣaṇātmasādhakatayā sāṅkhyairupakṣiptaṃ saṅghātaparārthatvānumānaṃ tāvaddūṣayati atrāpī tyādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3561: nanu saṅghātatvasya bhoktṛtvalakṣaṇe paratve 'hetutvānna saṅghātaparārthatvena saṅghātatvasya vyāptigraha ityatrā'ha na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3563: tadadhīnātiśayaścāsaṃhate nirlepe nirvikāra'ta evātiśayādhānānarhe sāṅkhyābhimatepuruṣe na sambhavatīti saṃhatasyaiva kasyacitsaṅghātaśeṣiṇo
GSP33yaatsi_u:3571: atastadadhīnātiśayabhāktvarūpe tatparatve saṅghātatvasya prayojakatvena tadavacchinnaparārthatvena vyāptigrahaḥ sambhavatyeveti cābhimatam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3573: yadyenopakriyate kriyate vā tattasya śeṣi pradhānamaṅgi bhavati, yattūpakaroti karoti vā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3576: kriyate, strakūcandanādineva dehādiḥ, prayājādineva ca yāgādiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3577: kriyate-niṣpādyate, daṇḍādineva ghaṭādiḥ, puroḍāśādineva ca yāgādiḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3578: tatra upakriyamāṇaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ vā aṅgi, upakārakaṃ kārakaṃ vā aṅgamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3583: evopakāro dehādibhiḥ sādhya iti tatparatvamupapadyata iti cettatrāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3594: chāyāyāḥ kāntilakṣaṇāyā ujjavalarūpavaddharmabhūtāyā nīrūpe caitanye 'sambhavānnīrūpe cāntaḥkaraṇe tatpratiphalanalakṣaṇasaṅkrānterayogādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3595: rūpavatyeva hi sphaṭikādau japākusumalohitādipratiphalanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3606: bhramādayo hi vṛttayo 'ntaḥkaraṇasya nirvṛttikatve nopapadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3608: taccennirvṛttikatvarūpam, naiva prasaṅgo bhramādyudayasya, tathā ca yadarthamayamārambhaḥ tatkāryamavasāditamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3614: tathā caivaṃvidhājaḍatvasya jñātṛtvasamānāśrayatvājjñātṛtvenaiva jñātṛtvasamanarthanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3620: yadvā na kiñcidetat-anatiprasaktaṃ prakṛtārthopapādakaṃ durnirūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3621: antaḥkaraṇasyājaḍatvopagame sāṅkhyasyāpasiddhāntaṃ cāha api ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3622: nanvantaḥkaraṇasya citisārūpyāsambhave 'pi tasmin citipratibimba eva jñātṛtvādimānastu ityatrāha na ca citī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3625: bimbagatasya vakratādeḥ pratibimbādhāragatasya vā mālinyādeḥ pratibimbe āropasambhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3626: na ca jñātṛtvaṃ bhramo vā prakṛte 'nyatarasminnapyasti, yasya citpratibimbe āropaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3630: tataśca citibuddhyorvivekāgrahācciti jñātṛtvapratibhāso yujyata eveti śaṅkate yaducyata ityādinā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3631: nirvikārāyā api citiśakteḥ sannidhānabalādevāntaḥkaraṇasya pratyakṣādipramāṇajñānabhrāntyādilakṣaṇā vṛttibhedāḥ samudayante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3632: prādhānyāt citeḥ tāsāṃ sākṣitvaṃ bhoktatvaṃ ca,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3633: yathā niśceṣṭasyāpi sārvabhaumasya prādhānyāt prabalasāmantacakrakartṛkayuddhaparākramavijayabhāktvaṃ tadvaditi śaṅkiturāśayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3636: sākṣitvaṃ hi na caitanyamātratvam, kintu sākṣāddraṣṭṛtvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3637: na tacciteḥ, draṣṭṛtvaṃ kalpitamiti cet nirvikāre nirdharmake kūṭasthe caitanye draṣṭṛtvabhramo 'pi na sambhavatītyuktameva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3638: dṛṣṭānte tu na nirvyāpāratvaṃsārvabhaumasya nirdharmakatvaṃ vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3643: naiyāyikādibhirādheyātiśayatvena bhoktatvena cābhimatasyātmanaḥ saṅghātaparārthatvānumānena sādhanaṃ syāditi cet, na /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3648: śarīrādivyatiriktasya bhoktaranumānātpūrvamasiddhyā ca vilakṣaṇabhoktrarthatvena vyāpteragrahādvilakṣaṇātmasādhanāyoga iti dik /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3653: dehādibhede ātmanaḥ śrutimeva pramāṇatayopanyasyanti śrotriyāḥ sa eṣa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3661: tathāca dehāderevotpattyādi nātmana ityatra śrutirna jāyata iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3663: śarīrasaṃsṛṣṭatvamapyaupādhikameva, muktautvaśarīratvamevetyatra śrutimupādatte na ha vai iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3664: śrutiṃ pramāṇamuktvā vilakṣaṇātmani śrutyarthāpattimapi pramāṇamāha kālāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3668: dehavināśordhvabhāvisvargādisādhanakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ tadvidhānaṃ vā bhoktarātmano dehātirekaṃ nityatvaṃ ca vinā hi na ghaṭate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3671: śāstratastu vilakṣaṇātmana upakaraṇatvenaiva tatsiddhiriti vilakṣaṇātmasiddhiḥ śāstrato niṣpratyūheti
GSP33yaatsi_u:3672: vilakṣaṇātmani anumānaikapramāṇakatvamāgamaikapramāṇakatvaṃ ca matabhedenopapādya pratyakṣatvaṃ mīmāṃsakamatena nirūpayitumupakramate nanu hitāhite ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3678: dehādivilakṣaṇaścātmā pratyakṣeṇaiva sphuṭamadhigamyata iti nātra purovāditālakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ śāstrasya sambhavatīti śrotriyopari pratyavasthānaṃ mīmāṃsakasya /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3679: ātmana indriyāgrāhyatvaṃ śaṅkate 'tra śrotriyaḥ maivaṃ voca ityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3684: / yogya eva hi pratyakṣaṃ prabhavati nāyogya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3690: manastu pravartiṣyate abhautikatvāditi; tanna; tasyāpīndriyatve bhautikatvasyāparihāryatvāt
GSP33yaatsi_u:3705: naca tadapi mānasapratyakṣatayā sapakṣe nikṣepamarhati; vimardāsahatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3706: yadā khalu kutaścidātmamanaḥsaṃyogādviṣayasaṃvit udayamāsādayati, tadaiva kiṃ tata
GSP33yaatsi_u:3707: eva tadgocaramapi vedanaṃ janyate, utānyadānyeneti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3715: kāryavirodhitve cānantarameva saṃskārodayānna kālāntare sthitiriti saṃvido na mānasapratyakṣavedyatvam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3721: na hi tasminnapratyakṣe tatpauṣkalyaṃvaikalyaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3725: tadantarbhāvamabhimanyate; kaṇabhakṣapakṣāśrayaṇena vā tayorātmaviśeṣaguṇatvam;tābhyāṃ sukhaduḥkhādhikaraṇaṃ vyācakṣīta;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3729: tadvirodhaprayuktaviṣayīkāraṃ tadeva dveṣaḥ, bhūtaduḥkhajñānena cetaścalanaṃ śokaḥ, āgāmitajjñānena cetaścalanaṃ bhayamityādi
GSP33yaatsi_u:3732: ekasya cātmano niraṃśasya na svāpekṣayā grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3734: aṃśabhedāśrayaṇe tatsiddhaye cāṃśāntaramāśrayitavyam, tathā tatra tatretyanavasthā; saṅghātatvaṃ cātmanaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3742: aho khalu svānubhava eva vibhramaḥ parīkṣakāṇām, yat viṣayānubhavasamaye pūrvāvasthāto na kañcidviśeṣamayamātmano 'vabudhyata
GSP33yaatsi_u:3744: uktaṃ hyetart-idṛśa evāyamarthaḥ, jñāyate na veti na vidmaḥ, mama vā pratibhāsate parasya vetyapi na vidma iti na jātucidevaṃ pratītirasti, jñānajñātroranavabhāse tādṛśyapi pratītirāpadyeta; iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3745: so 'yaṃ parasaṃcetitāt svasaṃcetitasyātiśayaḥ sarvatra parisphurannasati grāhakāvabhāse nopapadyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3746: anumitajñānālambanatve cājñāsiṣamityeva pratibhāsaḥ syāt, na jānāmīti;
GSP33yaatsi_u:3753: nanu kathamiva grāhakānavabhāse svaparavedyayoranatiśayaprasaṅgaḥ? nahi grāhakasiddhinibandhanaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3761: rūpabhedavyavasthā, tadapi hi saṃvedanaṃ tadānīṃ nilīnarūpamevendriyādivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3770: prakāśāvyabhicāraḥ, tathā prapañcitaṃ prathamādhikaraṇa iti nātropakṣipya pratikṣeptavyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3771: sato 'pi prameyajātasya svāpādisamaye 'nupalabderabhyupagataṃ tāvat saṃvidaḥ tatsādhakatvam
GSP33yaatsi_u:3774: yattu viṣayavittyuparame 'pi svāpasamaye 'yamātmā prakāśata iti, tat upapattibhirupapadyamānamapi yathāpratīti vyavaharatāṃ na cittamanurañjayati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3777: ātmā nendriyagrāhyaścetanatvāt, yannaivaṃ tannaivaṃ yathā ghaṭādīti cātra prayogaḥ //17//
GSP33yaatsi_u:3793: tatra saṃvidi hetau viśeṣaṇāṃśasya siddhatvādviśeṣyāṃśaṃ tāvatsādhayati na ca tadi ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3796: nanu jñātatayaiva jñānānumānamityananyopādhikatvaṃ jñānapratibhāsasyāsiddhamityatrāha apratyakṣatve ce ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3798: atīndriyatvena jñānasya tenāvinābhāvagrahāyogāt, jñānajanakasāmagryā jñātatāyā eva sākṣājjananasambhavādantarā jñānakalpanāyā apārthatvāccāsiddhireva syājjñānasyāpratyakṣatva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3799: saṃvedane sādhyasyāpi sattvamāśaṅkate na ca tadapī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3803: viṣayajñānasyodayakāla eva tadgocarajñānajñānasyāpi ātmamanaḥsaṃyogarūpakāraṇabalādutpattisvīkāre pūrvottarībhūtaviṣayajñānajñānajñānajñānajñānajñānadīnāṃ samudāyasya yaugapadyaprasaṅgaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3806: pratyakṣe viṣayasya hetutvātpūrvajñānajanitasyottarajñānasyānuvyavasāyarūpasya pūrvajñānaviṣayakatvamupapadyeta kramabhāvitve na tu yaugapadya ityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3807: / astu tarhi kramikatvaṃ viṣayajñānatadanuvyavasāyayorityatraha asame ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3812: kintu svakāryeṇaiva nivṛttiriṣyate jñānasyeti cettatrāha kārye ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3814: sahānavasthānalakṣaṇaṃ cedekakṣaṇamātravṛttitvam/ atra tu sahānavasthānalakṣaṇa eva virodho vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3824: / sādhanavikalatvamapi yadyapi phalati upapādanaprakāreṇa; athāpi siddhāntaprakriyayā jñānāvasthārūpatvātsukhādeḥ jñānasya ca svayaṃprakāśatvātsvayaṃprakāśatvaṃ sukhāderhṛdi nidhāya
GSP33yaatsi_u:3826: anvayaddaṣṭānte sādhyasya sādhanasya vā virahena tadavacchedena sādhyavyāptigraho hetau sambhavatīti vyāpyatvāsiddhirvivakṣitā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3827: nanu sukhaduḥkhayorapratyakṣatve pratyakṣavadavabhāsastayoḥ katham? tatrāha indriye ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3839: teṣāṃ ca pratyakṣatvāvabhāsaḥ tadviṣayānubhāvābhyāsaprācuryādeveti vaktavyaṃ yathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:3841: sukhaduḥkhayorātmābhinnatvam, ātmana āgantukadharmarūpatvaṃ ca matabhedena prasiddhamanuvadati yastusugate ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3848: nanu sukhaduḥkhayoḥ mānasapratyakṣatve vivāde 'pi rāgadveṣāveva nidarśane bhaviṣyata ityatrāha sukhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3849: sukhatvaprayuktaṃ viṣayīkaraṇamupādeyatāprakāśanaṃ yataḥ tajjñānameva rāgaḥ sukhagocaropādeyatābuddhilakṣaṇa iti yāvat /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3852: śokabhayayorapi na nidarśa natvaṃ sambhavatītyāha bhūte ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3862: kadācidekāṃśenānyāṃśagrahaṇam, anyadā cāṃśāntareṇaitadaṃśagrahaṇamiti kālabhedenopapatternānavastheti cettatrāpyāha saṅghātatvaṃ ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3863: ātmano niraṃśatvaviruddhaṃ ca sāṃśatvamevaṃ sati prasajyata ityarthaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3885: tataścānumitajñānoparaktātmamānasarūpo niruktānubhavaśca kādācitka eva, nāyaṃ ghaṭacākṣuṣarūpaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:3887: atra ca mānasapratyakṣe jñānavattvena viṣayatvaṃ dehādimattayā cāśrayatvamiti karmakartṛvirodhaparihāro 'bhimato bhāṭṭānām
GSP33yaatsi_u:3893: viṣayavedanakāle jñānasya jñātuścāvabhāsābhāve doṣaṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati ukta mityādinā /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3901: 'tītajñānālambanatvādajñāsiṣamityevābhilāpaḥ syāt, na tu jānāmīti jñāne vartamānatvollekha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3902: nanvatiśaighryāt kṣaṇabhedāgrahanibandhano vartamānatvāṃśe bhramalakṣaṇo jānāmīti pratyaya iti śaṅkāyāṃ tanmate dūṣaṇāntaramapi saṃsphorayati jñāne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3904: jñātatāliṅgakamapi jñānānumānaṃ jñānena jñātatāyā avinābhāvagrahāsambhavājjñānasāmagryaivānyathāsiddhatvācca jñātatāyā duḥsthameveti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3905: viṣayajñāna eva jñātuḥ prakāśaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mānasapratyakṣaṃ ca nirasyati mānase ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3916: svasmai jñāyamānatvena bhānamabhānaṃ cārthasyeti vailakṣaṇyasya virahaḥ svaparavedyayoḥ prasajyate viṣayavittau jñānajñātrorabhāne hītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3918: svasmai bhāsamānatvarūpo viśeṣor'thasya tajjñānasya svaniṣṭhatvādeva ghaṭate tajjñāne svasyābhāne 'pi /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3923: jñānaphalaprakāśena jhaṭityeva jñānasyānumānācca mama jñānaṃ jātamanyasya vetyāderapyaprasakteḥ

GSP33yaatsi_u:3956: paraprakāśakatvenaiṣṭavyāyāḥ saṃvida eva pramātravabhāsakatvamapi yuktamiti nātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśatvamapi kalpanīyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3957: svāpe 'pyātmano jñānamastīti matamanūdya khaṇḍayati yattu iti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:3966: naca manaso nityendriyatvena tatsaṃyogādeva tadā jñānaṃ janyata iti yuktam; svarūpato gaganavat nityasyāpi satastasyendriyabhāvena jñānotpādakatvasya dharmādharmāvarodhanibandhanatvāt svāpa ātmanaḥ prakāśaṃ niṣidhya muktāvapi taṃ niṣedhati apavṛktasye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3970: nanu tarhi muktau sārvajñyaparaśrutīnāṃ kā gatiḥ? tatrāha arthavādā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3986: karmacito lokaḥ kṣīyate evamevāmutra puṇyacito lokaḥ kṣīyate'
GSP33yaatsi_u:3990: tanmātranimittatve ca sarvadā ātmasvarūpavattadapi vidyata iti saṃsārānavatāraprasaṅgāt,
GSP33yaatsi_u:3992: na ca dehendriyādipratibaddhatayā idānīṃ tadabhāva iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3993: tat khalu pratibandhakam, yat sati puṣkalakāraṇe kāryodayaṃ niruṇaddhi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:3994: na cādyāpyātmanaḥ tatpuṣkalakāraṇatvaṃ siddham; śarīrendriyavatāmeva jñānadarśanāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4002: na hi tayā ātmavittiḥ svarūpaṃ vā seddhumarhati, atadviṣayatvāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4003: yo hi yatsaṃvidviṣayo na bhavati, nāsau tayā sidhyati rūpasaṃvidevarasaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4004: aviṣayau ca viṣayavitterbuddhiboddhārāviti tāvapi na tayā sidhyataḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4013: sāpi hi viṣayavadevānyasyaiva prakāśamānatayā na svataḥsidhyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4014: svataḥsidhyantī ca sā kimiti kañcideva prati cakāsti, na sarvān prati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4015: tatsamavāyāditi cet-yatsamavāyinī hi yā saṃvit tasyaiva sā cakāsti,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4016: netarasya, tadasamavāyāditi; yadyevam, āśritastarhi ātmasaṃbandhanibandhana eva saṃvidaḥ prakāśaḥ, tadbhāvābhāvānuvidhināt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4018: tadapekṣā, na svarūpasiddhaya iti; kutaḥ khalvayaṃ niścayaḥ? yadi hi pratiyoginirapekṣaiva kadācidātmasvarūpamiva saṃvit prakāśeta, tata evamadhyavasyemāpi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4020: āśrayapratiyogisāpekṣaiva saṃyogaputratvāderiva tasyāḥ svarūpasatteti na pṛthaksiddhyutprekṣāvakāśaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4021: / satyāḥ saṃvidaḥ prakāśavyabhicārābhāvāt svarūpaprayuktaḥ prakāśa iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4024: na hi te 'pi santo na prakāśante /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4025: athārthāntarasādhakatayā sarvavādisaṃmatāyāḥ saṃvida eva paraṃ svayaṃprakāśatvamāśritam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4031: tasya cādṛṣṭasahakāre satyeva śabdagrahakaraṇatvam, na tadvirahe iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4037: yogajadharmaprabhāvānmuktāvapi manasa indriyabhāvo 'nuvartata iti mānasamātmajñānaṃ tadā sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4042: mokṣakāle jñānasyātmaviṣayakasya sarvaviṣayakasya vā dharmajanyatve janyabhāvasya vināśitvaniyamātpunarajñānādiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4048: jñānakāraṇatayābhimatasyendriyādeḥ tyāgaḥ, akḷptasyaiva kevalasyātmanaḥ jñānakāraṇatvena kalpanaṃ ca prasajyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4050: ātmasvarūpamātranimittatve muktikālīnasya jñānasya sarvadaiva tat bhavediti saṃsārānavatāraprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4052: viśadatattvasākṣātkārarūpajñānabhāve 'pi saṃsāropagame ca doṣamāha bandhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4056: cet, tarhi tāvanmātrameva bhavenmokṣa iti kṛtaṃ jñānādināpārtheneti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4057: / ātmano muktikālīnajñāne hetubhūtasya nityatve 'pi na saṃsāre tatprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4058: dehādeḥ pratibandhakatvāditi śaṅkate na ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4070: ātmatattvājñānakāryā ātmaprakāreṣvayathāpratipattibhedā yeṣāṃ, teṣāmidaṃ nirarthakaṃ vacanamityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4071: kathaṃ nirarthakatvaṃ gurukteḥ? tatrāha viṣaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4075: atra ātmā vittisvarūpaṃ vā iti pāṭhaḥ syādvā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4078: aviṣayayorapi jñānajñātrorjñānabalata eva siddhiriti śaṅkate guruḥ nanu vedye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4079: vittireva, na tu vittiviṣayaḥ, viṣayavajjaḍā vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4080: veditaiva, na tu vedyaḥ, vedyavadajñātā vā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4082: nanu jñānāntaraviṣayatvenaiva tayoḥ prakāśo 'stvityatrāha uktaṃ hī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4083: svabalata eva vitteḥ siddhiṃ śaṅkāsamādhānamukhenāha kuta iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4087: tatra svaprakāśatvamākṣipati gurūktaṃ saṃvidaḥ siddhāntī maiva mityādinā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4088: svāśrayātmādhīnaprakāśatvādeva tasmā eva prakāśamānatvaṃ saṃvido ghaṭata iti svataḥsiddhatvāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ/ atra paraḥ parihāraṃ śaṅkate tatsamavāyāditi ce diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4090: svayaṃprakāśāpi saṃvidātmāpṛthaksiddhatvādātmana eva prakāśata iti bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4106: viṣayaprakāśakāla eva svāśrayāyaiva prakāśamānāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svaprakāśe viṣayātmasaṃbandhasāpekṣatvameṣitavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4108: viṣayeṇa saṃbandho jñānasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvalakṣaṇo vilakṣaṇaḥ svarūpasaṃbandhaviśeṣo 'styeveti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4110: antaḥkaraṇatadvṛttyupadhānaupādhikaṃ kevalaṃ tasyāḥ sāśrayatvādipratītimātramityatrāha āśraye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4115: nirviṣayatvena nirāśrayatvena ca sthitiḥ prakāśo vā saṃvido nāstyeva /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4117: tathā ca saṃvitprakāśe ātmasaṃbandhāpekṣāpi durvāraiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4118: svasattāvyāpakaprakāśatvena svaprakāśatvaṃ syātsaṃvida iti punaḥ śaṅkate satyā iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4120: tadā cātmasambandhasya niyatapūrvabhāvitvādapekṣitatvācca saṃvitprakāśe hetutvameṣṭavyameveti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4128: yatsākṣī khalvayaṃ puruṣaḥ, na tenāsau pratyakṣaḥ, ghaṭasākṣātkārīva ghaṭena /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4161: evaṃ saṃvedanamapi saṃvidantaraṃ svādhīnasiddhikamindriyādikaṃ vā nāpekṣate svasiddhau; apekṣate tu vijātīyaṃ svāśrayabhūtaṃ svatantramātmānam /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4180: na cātyantaluptakāryaṃ vastu tatkāryajananaśaktamityatra kiñcitpramāṇaṃ kramate /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4198: siddhiḥ prakāśa iti cet; kiṃ bhoḥ ātmā svayañjyotirapyarthādhīnaprakāśaḥ? yadasau tadarthamarthamapekṣate
GSP33yaatsi_u:4203: na hi sadā saṃnihitasamagrakāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ kadācidbhavati /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4206: nanvevamarthasiddhivyavasthāpakatayābhyupagataṃ jñānamāgantukaṃ kriyārūpamiti kathaṃ tadātmasvabhāvaḥ tathāhi-arthāntaragatatve sati janakadravyāntara prati kāryatvādikena rūpeṇāsādhāraṇo gantavyadeśaprāptyādiryaṃ pratyasādhāraṇaḥ tatsamavetāgantukāsādhāraṇagamanādikriyājanyo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4207: tādṛśī cārthasiddhiryaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyasādhāraṇī tatsamavetatādṛśakriyājanyeti śakyamanumātum
GSP33yaatsi_u:4213: nanu tat sasyapālanādisādhāraṇamiti kathamasādhāraṇakriyājanyatvam? api caivaṃ sati tadevārthaprakāśe 'pi janakavyāpāro 'stu; kimakḷptakalpanayā?
GSP33yaatsi_u:4214: / satyapi tasminnartho na prakāśata iti cet, svatvaṃ vā kiṃ yathoditaṃ sati jīvane jāyata eva ? /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4222: asti hi tatrāpīmaṃ deśamādityaḥ prakāśayati prācīkaśat prakāśayiṣyatīti pratītiḥ /
