GSP33yaatsi_u:4273: ya evāhaṃ pūrvedyurāsaṃ sa evāhamadyāpīti smṛtisaṃbhinnapratyayo 'pi

GSP33yaatsi_u:4282: kathaṃ punarnidrāyā avṛttitve prabuddhasya pratyavamarśāḥ sukhamahamasvāpsamityādyāḥ? na hyananubhūtagocarāḥ smṛtayaḥ saṃbhavanti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4283: sattvasacivasamullasitatamoguṇānubhavabhāvitabhāvanāyoniḥ khalu sukhamahamasvāpsaṃ, prasannaṃ me manaḥ, laghūni me gātrāṇīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4285: bhramatyanavasthitaṃ me cittamiti; sattvarajasī tvabhibhūya nitāntamudbhūte tamasi gāḍhamūḍhaṃ supto 'smi, gurūṇi me gātrāṇi,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4293: svāpāvasthāyāṃ vā indriyoparamatāratamyavaśādaviśadatātkālikatattadanukūlapratikūlaviṣayānusandhānanibandhanatayāpi smaraṇamupapadyata iti na vṛttyantaratvaṃ nidrāyāḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4302: astu vā pūrvoktapramāṇādivṛttyabhāvakāraṇabhūtapracitatamatamoguṇāvalambanā vṛttireva nidrā; santu ca prabuddhapratyavamarśāśca smaraṇāni; tathā
GSP33yaatsi_u:4307: ātmasvarūpaprakāśo 'pi na sarvadā, kintu viṣayajñānakāla eva jñānataḥ, na svataḥ iti pratyavasthānaprasaṅge jñānasya nityatvaṃ tāvadvyavasthāpayati atrāhu riti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4324: pāṣāṇakalpasya muktātmano 'cidvyāvartakacicchaktayāśrayaṇaṃ vyarthamityāha api ce ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4424: viśiṣṭe vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṅkāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādhe iti nyāyena viśiṣṭe kālāvacchedapratītirviśeṣaṇe paryavasyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4426: tathā ca yadrūpāvacchinnasya kālāvacchedapratītiḥ tasyānityatvameva svarūpamātrasya ca na kālāvacchedapratītiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4483: bodhasya sattve svāpa ātmano vyavahāraprasaṅga iti dvitīyākṣepaḥ /

GSP33yaatsi_u:4502: svāpādikālikātmānubhavaḥ svabhāvalakṣaṇa eva, natu dharmabhūtajñānāvasthāviśeṣalakṣaṇa iti yāvat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4508: vṛttaya iti bhāvaḥ/ na ca bodhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4510: dharmabhūtajñānaṃ tāvat nityamātmaviṣayakam, indriyārthasannikarṣādisahakārisaṃpattyā punarviṣayagrāhīti ekadeśimatenedam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4511: yadvā bodha eva svo bhāvaḥ svarūpam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4519: nityabodhasvarūpasya saṃskārajanakatvedoṣamuktvā niṣprayojanatvamapyāha anubhave ce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4521: nityānubhava eva jāgrati kaḥ saṃskārakalpanāyā artha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4529: tattatkālādyavacchinnasya vṛttigrāhyatayā vṛtteśca saṃskārajanakatayā nirukta pratyaya upapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4532: nityātmabodhasya saṃskārajanakatve bādhakaṃ prayojanābhāvaṃ cābhidhāya tasya svāpādikālikasya saṃskārajanakatvāsaṃbhavamapyabhidhatte aviśadaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4541: ata evāgre astu vā ityādinā pakṣāntaraṃ vakṣyati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4542: anubhave vartamāne tāvanmātraviṣayakasmṛterudayāyoge 'pi pratyavamarśasyādhikaviṣayasya saṃskārabalādudaye na kṣatiriti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4550: pratipattyānyadānanubhūyamānateva, yathā vā'ntarasya jāgaraṇe śarīradhāraṇaprayatnasya sadānuvartamānasyāpi
GSP33yaatsi_u:4565: mokṣe tu kleśātyantanivṛttiḥ, āvaraṇanivṛttyā nityāsaṅkucitasarvaviṣayajñānatā ceti viśeṣaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4568: samādhau ca puṃsaḥ paramavairāgyanirodhasaṃskārapāṭavātmaikapravaṇamanaskatvaprayuktamokṣopāyasiddhikṛtaḥ svāpato mahān viśeṣo 'stīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4577: atha svāpe 'pi anutyayā vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśaḥ setsyati, kṛtaṃ svaprakāśatvenetyantarnidhāya svāpe 'pi buddhivṛttireṣṭavyeti śaṅkate kathaṃ puna riti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4579: riṣadudbuddhasattvasahakṛtatama ālambanatve tasya sukhatvaṃ, sattvakāryaṃ ca laghutvādir /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4582: svāpe tama anubhave satyeva tajjasaṃskārataḥ prabodhe sukhamasvāpsamityādipratisandhānasyopapattiḥ nānyatheti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4597: nidrāyā vṛttirūpatvābhāve pātañjalasūtrasya kā gatiriti śaṅkate kathaṃ tarhī ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4602: anyathākhyāterabhāvena bhedāgrahasyaiva bhramasthalābhiṣiktasya viparyayaśabditasya niroddhavyatvatātparyeṇa vṛttitvavannidrāyā api vṛttitvaṃ kīrtyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4610: sukhamahamasvāpsamiti pratīteḥ pratisandhānarūpatvamupagamyāpyāha astu ve ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4614: yatti hṛdayaṃ vṛttyaivātmanaḥ prakāśo na svarūpata iti, tattvāśāmodakāyitamiti ca pūrvottarābhyāṃ sunirūpitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4618: uparatāni hi prasvāpakāle sarvāṇyevendriyāṇi saha manasā /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4622: kḷptaśca sarvārthasādhanatayā bodha iti tenaiva karaṇavirahiṇā satā svabhāvabhūteno(dbhūteno)dbhūtavṛttestamaso
GSP33yaatsi_u:4627: vṛtteḥ karaṇajanyatvāditi parasya śaṅkāmanuvadati āhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4631: svāpe kāraṇāyogātsvataḥsiddha eva tamaḥprakāśako bodha ityeṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //27//
GSP33yaatsi_u:4635: ataḥ svābhāvikena bodhenaiva tamoguṇaprakāśa iti balādeṣṭavyaṃ yadi tamo 'nubhavaḥ svāpa iṣyate
GSP33yaatsi_u:4638: svarūpānubhavabalātsukhatvena tadā bhāsamānasyātmanaḥ parāmarśaḥ paraṃ prabodha iti tu siddhāntaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4640: nityānubhavasya saṃskārājanakatve tu sākṣādeva svāpakālīnātmasvarūpānubhavasya niruktapratisandhānahetutvaṃ sukhatvenātmāgāhanāṃśa iti ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4641: bodhasvabhāvasyāpyātmano vṛttikāla evāstu prakāśo na sarvadetyatra tāvannityaprakāśatvaṃ sādhayati nityaprakāśaśce ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4647: kaḥ punarayaṃ prakāśaḥ, yo 'sya nityo 'bhyupeyeta svābhāvikaśca?
GSP33yaatsi_u:4650: tato hetvabhāvena sādhyābhāvasya vyāptimupadarśayituṃ nidarśanatayā ghaṭādyupādātavyam-yadanityaprakāśamanyādhīnaprakāśaṃ vā tadapramātṛ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4652: tatra ca viśeṣaniṣedhasya sāmānyābhyanujñākṣepakatvādāgantukaṃ jñānaṃ ghaṭādāvanumatamāpadyeta
GSP33yaatsi_u:4653: atha tanmābhūditi viṣayaviṣayibhāva eva saṃbandhaḥ saṃgīyeta, tato nityavajjñānaviṣayatvamātmanaḥ prasatyeta /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4654: jñānaviṣayīkāraśca sādhanaviśeṣāyattatvena niyata iti na svābhāvikatvasambhavaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4655: acetanagocara eva tathā niyama iti cenna,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4657: na cānātmagocara eva sādhanasāpekṣatvaniyama iti vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4666: api tu tannimittaścetanetarasarvapadārthasādhāraṇo dharmaḥ, yadvaśāt prakāśata iti prakhyopākhyepratāyete
GSP33yaatsi_u:4668: sa ca yathoditasādhanabalādeva sāṃsiddhiko nityaścātmana iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4674: jñeyasya jñātuḥ svātmanaśca vyavahārānuguṇaṃ jñānamudayata iti yuktaḥ triṣvapi ekarūpaḥ prakāśatevyavahāraḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4675: tattvāntaraprakāśābhyupagametātsvābhāvye jhr na ṭa ca punaḥ kiṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4677: na ca prakāśa eva taditi vācyam, ghaṭāderapi prakāśavattayā cetanatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4678: yadyucyet-sati cetanāvattve puṃsaḥ prakāśamānatvamiti: saṃvidīdānīṃ kā vārtā? cetanaiva hi sā, na cetayate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4679: atha saṃvidastatsaṃbandhādhīnaḥ sa dharma iti cet; kastayā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4687: tayā cānumeyaṃ jñānamiti pakṣaḥ prāgeva pratikṣiptaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4689: ātmani samavetaṃ jñānamasaṃbandhinyarthe prakāśaṃ vyavahāraṃ vā kathaṃ prasuvītetyapi cintyam
GSP33yaatsi_u:4691: na khalu labdhātmakaṃ kāryaṃ svanimittakāraṇamanurudhya kāryamārabhate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4695: ata indriyeṇa saha caitanyamapi nissṛtya tena tenārthena
GSP33yaatsi_u:4697: tathā sati hi tadupādhikatvāttajjñānasya yuktaṃ tadbhāvānuvidhāyitvam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4701: kutastannivṛttau arthaprakāśo nivartate? kuto vā yāvattadbhāvamavatiṣṭhate ? /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4702: nanu nityaprakāśatvaṃ svābhāvikabodhakṛtameva kiṃ na syādityatrāha svataḥsiddhe ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4706: jñānasya prakāśo jñānāntarānapekṣo 'pyātmasambandhāpekṣa iti jñāne 'nanyādhīnaprakāśatvalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ nāsti, tena sapakṣe jñāne sati pakṣamātravṛtti jñātṛtvaṃ bhavatyasādhāraṇamiti śaṅkānavakāśaḥ /yadyapi
GSP33yaatsi_u:4712: atha prasaṅgāt prakāśa padārthaṃ nirṇetuṃ vimarśamupakṣipati kaḥ puna riti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4721: na caivaṃ sati tatra hetvabhāvo 'jñātṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4723: prakāśāśrayatvamātrasya tu sādhanāyogaḥ siddhatvāditi ca bodhyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4724: uktadoṣaparihārāya prakārāntaraṃ śaṅkate atha tanmābhū diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4730: / ata itarānapekṣo nityaśca jñānaviṣayabhāva ātmano duḥsādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4736: svātmabhinnaviṣaya eva viṣayīkārasya karaṇāpekṣatvamucyata iti na ca vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4739: svātmaprakāśane 'pi śabdaliṅgādikaraṇasāpekṣatvadarśanāt niyamasaṅkoco na karaṇīya ityarthaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4741: asya cātmaviṣayīkaraṇe na karaṇāpekṣetyatrāha viruddhe iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4743: svarūpamātrajñāne ākārabhedādavirodhasamarthanamapi na sambhavatītyāha nityatve tyādivākyadvayena
GSP33yaatsi_u:4744: nanu svarūpasyaiva gamyatvepi tasyaiva gamakatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣadharmabhedāddhaṭetetyatrāha rūpabhedene ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4747: svayaṃprakāśatvamapakṣasya śabdasya, evaṃ grāhyagrāhakatāvacchedakadharmabhede pakṣīkṛtasyāpi ātmano na svaprakāśatvaṃ sidhyedityarthaḥ/ evaṃ vimarśakena pakṣadvayaṃ dūṣitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4751: prakāśata iti pratītivyavahārau ca prākaṭyāśrayatvārthakāveva prācuryeṇa pravartete /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4753: sa eva nityaḥ svābhāvikaścātmanaḥ sādhyatāṃ jñātṛtvabalāditi śaṅkāgranthārthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4755: jñātatāvyavahārasya svaprakāśajñānata evopapatterna jñānajanye jñātatākhye dharmāntare pramāṇaṃ kimapīti parākaraṇaprakāraḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4758: tadadhīnavyavahārānuguṇyaṃ sambandhaḥ prakāśata ityatrākhyātārtha iti pakṣa eva jñeyajñānajñātṛṣu ekārthakatā prakāśatevyavahārasya ghaṭata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4760: jñānātiriktasya prakāśasya nityasyātmanyupagame tatra jñānaṃ vyarthamiti cāha tattvāntare ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4761: svaviṣayakajñāne satyevātmanaḥ prakāśamānateti kṣemasādhāraṇaprayojakatopagamānnātmani caitanyasya vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkate yadyucyete ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4765: tathā ca caitanyasamavāyitvasya prakāśamānatāprayojakatve caitanye tadabhāvātprakāśamānatā na ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4766: nanu caitanyasambandha eva prakāśaheturupeyata iti cettatrāha kastaye ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4775: prakāśaprayojakasya caitanyaviṣayatvasyāṅgulyagreṇeva svātmasparśasyāśakyatvāccaitanye, karmakartṛtvavirodhādātmani cāsambhava iti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4777: jñānasya tvatīndriyasya jñātatāliṅgakānumānātprākaṭyaṃ sambhavati prakāśatevyavahāranidānamityatrāha jñānādhīne ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4779: tathā ca prākaṭyena jñānajadharmeṇārtheṣu, jñānarūpatayā jñāne,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4780: jñānāśrayatayaiva cātmani prakāśatevyavahāra iti triṣvapi tasyaikarūpyāsambhava etanmata iti sthitam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4781: evaṃ bhāṭṭamate jñeyajñānajñātṛṣu prakāśatevyavahārasyaikarūpyāsambhavaṃ gurumukhena procya gurumate 'pi triṣu vyavahārānuguṇye aikarūpyāsambhavaṃ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4784: jñāne, jñānāśrayatayā cātmani vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vaktavyamiti gurumate 'pi
GSP33yaatsi_u:4788: yadarthasaṃbaddhendriyaliṅgādinā yajjñānaṃ janitam, tat tasminnarthe prakaṭatāṃ vyavahārānuguṇyaṃ vā niṣpādayatīti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4793: anyathā kulālasannidhāna eva ghaṭena jalasyāharaṇam, nānyatrepi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4794: jñānasyaiva svakāryaniṣpādane svanimittāpekṣetyāśrayaṇe cedamapi vaiṣamyaṃ prasajyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4797: anyatra nimittanāśe kāryanāśasyādarśanāt jñānasyaiva nimittanāśena nāśābhyupagamenāpi vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4800: iti indriyādidvārā prasṛtasya tena sahārthasannikṛṣṭasya jñānasyārthaprakāśakasyārthapkāvyavahāra- janakatvaṃ svīkāryamanāyatyeti hārdam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4803: indriyeṇa saha pravṛttyādimattve hi jñānasya tadarthasannikṛṣṭasya tatprakāśakasyendriyārthasannikarṣānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyyanvayavyat irekopapattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4818: yadi ghaṭādeḥ svarūpamevaikatvam, tato ghaṭa ekaḥ, paṭa eka iti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4820: nahi ghaṭasvarūpasya paṭasvarūpeṇa saṃbhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4827: apekṣābuddhināśena dvitvādināśasyāsiddhatvena na nimittanāśena kāryanāśe dvitvādernāśasya nidarśanatvaṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4833: dṛṣṭānte hetvāsiddhiṃ śaṅkate nanu naikatvam iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4849: dṛṣṭānte hetvasiddhiṃ śaṅkate ' nanu naikatva 'm iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4862: bodhyam-uddeśyatāvacchedakāvacchinnaparyāpterdvitvādisaṃbandhatayā bhānāt ekatvāvacchinnaparyāpteśca dvitvādisaṃbandhatvābhāvena na ekaṃ dvāviti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4864: ekaṃ dvitvavaditi tu syānnāma, atra dvitvasamavāyasyaiva svarūpasaṃbandhena bhānāt, tasya caikasminnapyabādhāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4871: anyacca, arthasya prakāśakaṃ hi jñānaṃ bhavatām /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4872: sarvaṃ ca prakāśakaṃ prakāśyavastusannikṛṣṭameva prakāśakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dīpaprabhādi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4874: vyomavadamūrtasya na kriyāvattvamiti cet, keyaṃ mūrtirnāma ? yadvirahiṇaḥ kriyāyogaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4877: na hi tatsarvagataṃ dravyam, tathāsati yugapat sarvārthasiddhiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4878: kvācitkatve tu tadvi yadaikadaikendriyeṇa saṃprayuktaṃ tadarthābhimukham, na tadendriyāntaramadhitiṣṭhati
GSP33yaatsi_u:4885: sa khalu śaṅkhamukhāderdavīyaso 'pi deśāt nodanaviśeṣeṇa loṣṭādiriva yāvadvegaṃ pratiṣṭhate sparśavihīno 'pi /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4887: kathamatītānāgatayorasatoścaitanyena saṃprayoga iti cet, kathaṃ vā viṣayabhāvaḥ, prakāśamānatvam, saṅkhyādiyogo vā tayoḥ ? yastatra nirvāhaḥ,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4889: api cātītatayānāgatatayā ca tāvapyadyāpi vidyete iti tena rūpeṇa bodhasannikarṣe kānupapattiḥ ? kiñca, yathā davīyasi deśe satā dhruvaśiṃśumārādinā dṛk tu sannikṛṣyate, tathā davīyasi kāle satā kalpādyantavartinā svayaṃbhuvādineti nālokaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4897: nanu yāvadāśrayaṃ sattve āśrayopalambhakāle niyamata ekatvasyeva dvitvāderupalambhaḥ prasajyate iti cettatrāha ' āpekṣikatvā ' diti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4899: saṃbandhyantarasyāgrahaṇāt, grahaṇe vā dvitvādibubhutsāyā apekṣābuddheśca tadvodhe sahakāriṇyā viraheṇa na sadā graha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4900: evaṃ ca nimittanāśanāśyatvasya na nidarśanībhavitumalaṃ dvitvādatyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4901: vastuto 'pekṣābuddhiviśeṣātiriktaṃ dvitvādikamevāprāmāṇikamiti tannāśādhīnatannāśasya na tarāṃ prasaktiriti bodhyam // 33 //
GSP33yaatsi_u:4907: api cendriyaliṅgasaṃskārāderyadarthapratiniyataṃ rūpam, tainaivopaśliṣya nissaraccaitanyamapi tadgocareṇaiva sannikṛṣṭate ; yathā gavādipadaśaktirekabuddhisiddhe 'pi sāmānyaviśeṣātmake vastuni sāmānyāṃśenaiva saṃbadhyate, yathā vā vidhiḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:4909: ata indriyādidvāreṇa caitanyaṃ tadarthābhimukhaṃ nirgacchatīti nyāyyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4912: manuśca, " indriyāṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yadyekaṃ kṣaratīndriyam /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4913: tenāsya kṣarati prajñā dṛteḥ pādādivodakam // " iti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4914: yattu guṇaścaitanyaṃ guṇinamapahāya kathamanyato yātīti ; tadayuktam,
GSP33yaatsi_u:4918: dṛśyante ca guṇā api śabdagandhasūryālokaratnaprabhādayo gatimanto dharmyativartinaśca /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4920: nanu nabha iva vibhuḥ śabdo vyañjakadhvanivaśena prādeśika iva gatvara iva copalabhyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4925: yaśca yena dravyeṇa niyatasahotpattirguṇaḥ sa tadguṇa eva, yathā tathāvidhā rūpādayaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4928: utpadyate ca śabdaḥ indriyagrāhyatve sati guṇatvāt gandhādivat /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4934: abhivyañjakāśca ekadeśāvasthitānekendriyagrāhyān yugapadabhivyañjanti, yathā pradīpo rūpasaṅkhyāparimāṇāni
GSP33yaatsi_u:4936: na caivaṃ tālvādisaṃyogavibhāgajanitapavana iti nāsau vyañjakaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4937: jñānasyārthasannikarṣānupagame bādhakamuktvār'thasannikarṣe sādhakaṃ cāha ' anyacce ' ti
GSP33yaatsi_u:4946: sparśavattvaṃ mūrtatvamiti pakṣe doṣamāha ' śabdene ' ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4949: tathā cāsparśasyāpi jñānasya prasaraṇādau nānupapattiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4951: tasya dravyatve vimatyāmapi saṃpratipannasthalāntare taddarśayat ' sparśe ' ti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:4953: śabdāśrayaśca vāyuḥ sparśavāniti na niruktaniyame kṣatiriti cettatrāha ' sparśe ' ti /

GSP33yaatsi_u:5449: ātmano nirantarānucintanalakṣaṇe yoge bhāvanāprakarṣaparyante niṣpanne sati,
GSP33yaatsi_u:5456: tatra sugatamatānusāriṇaḥ sanmātrānubandhinīṃ kṣaṇikatāmācakṣāṇā nityātmadarśanameva sarvānarthamūlaṃ manyamānāḥ kṣaṇabhaṅginamenaṃ saṅgirante; yat sat tat
GSP33yaatsi_u:5460: yanna kasmaicitkāryāya, antataḥ sārvajñyavijñānagotaratvāyāpi na prabhavati, na tasya sadbhāvaḥ
GSP33yaatsi_u:5462: na ca sā svavyāpakabhūtakramayaugapadyavirahiṇyakṣaṇike saṃbhavinītyanyatra niravakāśatayā kṣaṇikatayaivānubadhyate /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5463: kathaṃ punaḥ kramayaugapadyayorarthakriyāvyāpakatvam? kathaṃ vā tayorakṣaṇikānnivṛttiḥ?
GSP33yaatsi_u:5466: svaprakāśasyātmano dharmabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayādigrahaṇe dehādivailakṣaṇyagrahaṇe cātmana upayujyata ityetāvatā siddham /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5472: ātmanaḥ kālasaṃbandhe vicāraviṣaye kṣaṇamātrakālasaṃbandhinaṃ vināśinamātmānamāmananti kecana
GSP33yaatsi_u:5477: tadeva kuta ityataḥ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvavyāptyarhaṃ pariṣkaroti yanneti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5482: taccākṣaṇike sthire 'ghaṭamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ kṣaṇike vyavaśtāpayatīti sattva kṣaṇikatvavyāpyamevetyāpatatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5484: kartṛtvavyāpakatvam, tasya sthire 'sambhavaṃ copapādayituṃ praśnaḥ kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33yaatsi_u:5495: yaugapadyāsaṃbhave kramaḥ, tadabhāve ca yaugapadyaṃ niyatamiti kramayaugapadyānyataravyāpyaivārthakriyā bhavatītyarthaḥ //44/
GSP33yaatsi_u:5497: athāpi sthire kathaṃ na sā? tatrāha na ceti /
